    <script>
        var o2_closedBtn = '&lt;div class="ui large disabled button order-now-action o2_closed o2pad-fix tac"&gt;Closed for Online Orders&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;';
        var o2_openBtn = '&lt;a class="ui large green button order-now-action o2pad-fix o2_link" data-app_link="http://bnc.lt/a/key_live_kco2jTV88p9tTjVZFpOiiolesAiaaEBI?channel=desktop&amp;campaign=Restaurant_First-Fold_Restaurant-Order-Now_Sticky" href="https://www.zomato.com/chennai/hotel-saravana-bhavan-anna-nagar-west/order" data-source="order-button"&gt;Order Food Online&lt;/a&gt;';

        window.o2_btns_html = [o2_closedBtn, o2_openBtn];

        var request = new XMLHttpRequest();
        request.open('POST', 'https://www.zomato.com/php/geto2banner', true);
        request.setRequestHeader('Content-type', 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded');
        request.onreadystatechange = function() {
            // If successful response
            if (request.status == 200 &amp;&amp; request.response.length) {
                var response = JSON.parse(request.responseText);
                var o2_buttons = document.querySelectorAll('#we-btn-container');

                // Delivery status in array
                if(response.delivery_status &lt; o2_btns_html.length) {
                    // When the DOM is loaded update the buttons
                    if(document.readyState != 'loading'){
                        [].forEach.call(o2_buttons, function(button) {
                            button.innerHTML = o2_btns_html[response.delivery_status];
                        });
                    } else {
                        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
                            [].forEach.call(o2_buttons, function(button) {
                                button.innerHTML = o2_btns_html[response.delivery_status];
                            });
                        });
                    }
                }
            }
        };
        // POST Banner data
        request.send('res_id=65499&amp;obp_flag=1&amp;city_id=7');
    </script>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="è" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-8" title="Excellent" aria-label="Rated 4.5">Rated</div> 
                                            Aapam along with their gravy is the best in town.Aapam has a mild sweetness but their gravy is so spicy and this combo makes a perfect dish.You will not get over the taste of it
                                                            <div class="clear"></div>
                </div>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ø" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-6" title="Good" aria-label="Rated 3.5">Rated</div> 
                                            This place was an institution in the 1980s and 90s with great quality Tamil vegetarian food with decent pricing. They still handle a big volume of customers well, but as with most institutions prices go up and food quantity and quality declines - maybe because of all the stiff competition.<br />
Still a good place for a nice South Indian vegetarian meal.

                                <div class="fs12px pbot0 clearfix">
                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/YzbXdM" class="grey-text">
                        <time datetime="2016-10-01 21:28:07" itemprop="datePublished">26 days ago</time>
                    </a>

                                        	                    
                </div>
            </div>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ø" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-6" title="Good" aria-label="Rated 3.5">Rated</div> 
                                            Good quality south Indian food with decent pricing is the perfect combination that saravana bhavan provides .<br />
The staff is courteous and professional,good service.<br />
I used to visit this place once a week for dinners as it is near my place.<br />
Located in prime location and having the biggest accomodating space throughout Chennai,this place caters to a huge number of customers.<br />
Definitely a go for good south indian meal.
                                                            <div class="clear"></div>
                </div>

                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/LbDyxZ" class="grey-text">
                        <time datetime="2016-06-08 11:54:15" itemprop="datePublished">4 months ago</time>
                    </a>

                                        	                    
                </div>
            </div>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="õ" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-4" title="Average" aria-label="Rated 2.5">Rated</div> 
                                            I have been a regular here from the age of 10 where this was our monthly restaurant visit whenever the topic of eating out came in back in the hey days of the hotel.<br />
<br />
Here, however, now; the place has eroded itself into a mere shell of it's former self with impatient waiters, average taste, much lesser quantities and to top it all, exorbitant prices for all of the above.<br />
<br />
Sambhar is practically the only thing that is saving this place for me inspite of all that is wrong with this place. The impatience of the waiters was the last straw (I got a bill by the time I was done with sambhar vada after he asked if I was going for a juice) and I am done with this place, for good.
                                                            <div class="clear"></div>
                </div>
            
            
            
                                    
                                                
                
		<div aria-label="Like" data-likes="2" data-reviewid="27306020" data-active="1" data-action="like" class="left mr5 ui tiny labeled button js-btn-thank">

								<span>Like</span>

    <span itemtype="http://schema.org/Restaurant" itemscope="" itemprop="itemReviewed" style="display:none">
        <span itemprop="name">Hotel Saravana Bhavan, Anna Nagar West, Chennai</span>
    </span>

    <div data-res_id="65499" data-snippet="restaurant-review" data-review_id="27108218" class="  ui segments res-review-body res-review clearfix js-activity-root   item-to-hide-parent stupendousact">

                                <div class="item">
                    <div class="clearfix  mb10 ">
                        <div itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope="" itemprop="author" class="res-large-snippet ui horizontal list col-s-16  ">

  <div class="item col-s-16">

    <div class="content col-l-11 large-snippet ml5 mt5">

      <div itemprop="name" class="header nowrap ui left">

                                <div class="fs12px pbot0 clearfix">
                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/lKzZry" class="grey-text">
                        <time datetime="2016-05-18 20:19:14" itemprop="datePublished">5 months ago</time>
                    </a>

                                        	                    
                </div>
            </div>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 hidden " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ø" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-6" title="Good" aria-label="Rated 3.5">Rated</div> 
                    This review is about the vegetarian buffet @ HSB Anna Nagar. To begin with welcome drink will be offered either watermelon juice or lemon jaljeera juice.<br />
Two soups will be served on the table. Three starters will be available such as gold coin, masala vada, Gobi fry, crispy fried veg, mushroom fry as the menu varies everyday.<br />
On  order, we can get plain dosa, plain uthapam, pizza, roti and naan. Pizza was bad, naan was  ok but dosa and uthapam were good.<br />
On order we will get chats - pani Poori and dahi Poori as well which tastes good.<br />
Main course there's noodles of Chinese style which is really tasty. Rice varieties there's one traditional south indian pulao and one Chinese rice. Three gravies mostly one in mushroom or gobi and two made of mixed veggies will be in the counter. Then we have the regular  rasam, sambar, veggie fry, curd rice, masala papad, appalam, pickle, podi, etc.<br />
Coming to  desserts, don't expect much as its south Indian desserts. You will only get sweets such as Mysore Pa, jalebi, jangri, laddu,.. Then a small scoops of vanilla ice cream on order. <br />
<br />
Overall for 350 inc tax desserts could definitely be improved. Also all the gravies will have a sweetish tinge which could be avoided. But knowing the pricey menu of saravana bhavan where we can hardly get anything for 350 this buffet is definitely worth a try.
                                        <div class="clear"></div>
                </div>
                <div class="rev-text-sm mbot0">
                    <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text-expand " tabindex="0">

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ò" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-1" title="Poor" aria-label="Rated 1.0">Rated</div> 
                                            One of the worst experiences EVER in a restaurant. The old Saravana Bhavan is a distant memory and this branch is just creating more distance between us and the good old days we were used to.<br />
<br />
I am so exasperated that I don't want to go into details as this place is just a waste of time, as I will do with my time by writing about it.<br />
<br />
The food was bad, the service DOWNRIGHT PATHETIC, THE SERVER RUDE, UNCOUTH AND GENERALLY CLAIMED THAT WE ARE LIARS IN FRONT OF HIS MANAGER. I wish I had got his name and ensured that he paid for the bad experience we endured. NOTHING, ABSOLUTELY NOTHING WAS DONE TO ENSURE THAT WE LEFT WITH A BETTER EXPERIENCE. INSTEAD WE LEFT FUMING AND VOWED NEVER TO PUT A FOOT AGAIN IN THIS PLACE (AS IF THEY CARE!!!).
                                                            <div class="clear"></div>
                </div>

                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/qmgZwp" class="grey-text">
                        <time datetime="2016-05-13 23:08:32" itemprop="datePublished">5 months ago</time>
                    </a>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ø" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-6" title="Good" aria-label="Rated 3.5">Rated</div> 
                                            One of my standard favourite places to go to for good south Indian food. <br />
A simple evening snack, a good family dinner, a happy lunch... whatever maybe the cause... this place can fulfill your food needs. <br />
The service has always been polite. <br />
No problems with parking either.  <br />

                                                            <div class="clear"></div>

                    <div data-iconr="ö" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-5" title="Average" aria-label="Rated 3.0">Rated</div> 
                                            Saravana Bhavan has become synonymous with chennai and with growing fame the prices have also moved up. Sadly the food quality has not kept pace and is no longer value for money. Having said that it is a safe place where u get average but consistent quality of food. We tried the tamilnadu thali at this branch and the spread and dishes were ok, although there were minor issues like dal did not have salt etc. Overall an average 3 out of 5
                                                            <div class="clear"></div>

                    <div data-iconr="ò" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-1" title="Poor" aria-label="Rated 1.0">Rated</div> 
                                            Went to this place after 6 years as I had no choice. The food quality has become worse.<br />
They've employed illiterate goons as managers who don't even know how to talk to customers. When you get a parcel, ask for extra chutney and you will know! According to their ridiculous policy they give extremely small packet of chutney no matter how many dosas or ildy you buy. (Only for parcel)

            </div>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ø" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-6" title="Good" aria-label="Rated 3.5">Rated</div> 
                                            Was surprised to find out that they serve Buffet breakfast here in the top floor of the restaurant. Liked it. South Indian and continental breakfast made the menu. Everything was fine except the sorrowful welcome drink they serve. 
                                                            <div class="clear"></div>
                </div>

                </div>
                                <div class="fs12px pbot0 clearfix">
                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/rOagqm" class="grey-text">
                        <time datetime="2016-01-24 21:04:53" itemprop="datePublished">9 months ago</time>
                    </a>

                                        	                    
                </div>
            </div>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ø" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-6" title="Good" aria-label="Rated 3.5">Rated</div> 
                                            I've lost count of the number of times I've been to this restaurant. But it's become quite expensive over the years. Plus the portions have become smaller as well. Inflation much?<br />
<br />
There's no doubt that South Indian food here is yummy. Their mini tiffin, 14 idlies, dosas are all deliciously melt-in-your-mouth and you can't go wrong ordering anything South Indian here. The meals is also quite good though again, a bit expensive.<br />
<br />
However, don't order North Indian food or any chaat here. This place isn't exactly known for it. The Pani poori is okay though. The juices here are good but I'm not really a fan of their ice creams. 
                                                            <div class="clear"></div>
                </div>

                                <div class="fs12px pbot0 clearfix">
                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/Mzelbw" class="grey-text">
                        <time datetime="2016-01-22 14:33:17" itemprop="datePublished">9 months ago</time>
                    </a>

                                        	                    
                </div>
            </div>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ò" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-1" title="Poor" aria-label="Rated 1.0">Rated</div> 
                                            Boy, has this place declined in quality! What used to be a pleasant and affordable place for vegetarian food, has now hit rock bottom. Overcrowded, dirty and unhygeinic, you are bound to lose your appetite the moment you enter. In a way this is good because it would curtail your order and save you a fortune. The exponentiating prices at HSB is perfectly correlated (inversely, off course) with the quality of service. The order takers and waiters are a consistently disinterested lot, who have also forgotten that the hallmark of HSB was hygiene. I have yet to see a waiter or cleaner washing their hands with soap and water after using the toilet; terrible in a food service organization. If I have escaped without food poisoning, it is a testament to my reselience alone. Strongly suggest giving this place a skip. There are scores of better restaurants in the neighborhood.
                                                            <div class="clear"></div>
                </div>

                                <div class="fs12px pbot0 clearfix">
                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/XXaYbv" class="grey-text">

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ö" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-5" title="Average" aria-label="Rated 3.0">Rated</div> 
                                            An Anna Nagar resident since being a kid, I would've been here more times than I can remember. The noisy, crowded place with aroma of their signature sambar in the air and such attentive and quick service that used to provide has significantly declined. <br />
<br />
In recent times, the taste of sambar isn't as superb as it used to be or the way I remembered. They really need a comeback before this becomes their permanent reputation.<br />
<br />
I prefer Sangeetha Restaurant in terms of both taste and prices.<br />
<br />
PARKING : Almost impossible owing to the crowd and traffic near the signal.
                                                            <div class="clear"></div>
                </div>

    <div data-res_id="65499" data-snippet="restaurant-review" data-review_id="25542997" class="  ui segments res-review-body res-review clearfix js-activity-root   item-to-hide-parent stupendousact">
        <div class="ui segment clearfix  brtop ">
            
            <div class="ui warning message error-message-highlight review-message hidden mbot"></div>

            <div class="ui item clearfix ">
                                <div class="item">
                    <div class="clearfix  mb10 ">
                        <div itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope="" itemprop="author" class="res-large-snippet ui horizontal list col-s-16  ">

    <span itemtype="http://schema.org/Restaurant" itemscope="" itemprop="itemReviewed" style="display:none">
        <span itemprop="name">Hotel Saravana Bhavan, Anna Nagar West, Chennai</span>
    </span>

    <div data-res_id="65499" data-snippet="restaurant-review" data-review_id="25540202" class="  ui segments res-review-body res-review clearfix js-activity-root   item-to-hide-parent stupendousact">
        <div class="ui segment clearfix  brtop ">
            
            <div class="ui warning message error-message-highlight review-message hidden mbot"></div>

            <div class="ui item clearfix ">
                                <div class="item">
                    <div class="clearfix  mb10 ">
                        <div itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope="" itemprop="author" class="res-large-snippet ui horizontal list col-s-16  ">

  <div class="item col-s-16">
    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/wazzaarvind">
            <img data-original="https://b.zmtcdn.com/data/user_profile_pictures/732/e99b293cf872fb40cd93fac747975732.jpg?fit=around%7C100%3A100&amp;crop=100%3A100%3B%2A%2C%2A" src="https://b.zmtcdn.com/data/user_profile_pictures/732/e99b293cf872fb40cd93fac747975732.jpg?fit=around%7C100%3A100&amp;crop=100%3A100%3B%2A%2C%2A" alt="Arvind Srinivass" class="ui avatar image left tiny" style="display: block;" />
          </a>


<!--      -->

    <div class="content col-l-11 large-snippet ml5 mt5">

      <div itemprop="name" class="header nowrap ui left">
                  <a data-entity_id="183595" href="https://www.zomato.com/wazzaarvind">
            Arvind Srinivass

                                <div class="fs12px pbot0 clearfix">
                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/GYrDOK" class="grey-text">
                        <time datetime="2015-11-19 22:25:26" itemprop="datePublished">11 months ago</time>
                    </a>

                                        	                    
                </div>
            </div>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 hidden " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ö" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-5" title="Average" aria-label="Rated 3.0">Rated</div> 
                    How the standards have fallen! Being born and brought up in Anna Nagar, I have been going to this place like forever, probably for more than 17-18 years.<br />
<br />
Had you asked me to review this restaurant some 12 years ago, I would have probably given this place a five. I used to basically live in this restaurant then, when it started off as a non ac restaurant above the Anna Nagar branch of Andhra Bank, considering my dad used to work in that branch. During those days, this was the standout restaurant if you were from a vegetarian family and the Akshayam's of this world didn't exist.<br />
<br />
I would go there as a kid and order Poori every time, being fond of it as a kid. Over the years, other than Poori, 14 mini idly, Parotta with kurma, Appam, Chilly Parotta, and most of the dosas were my favourite dishes over here. I would never get bored of those. Everyone wanted to know how to make Saravana Bhavan sambar at home. The meals,wow!<br />
<br />
The standards have fallen quite a lot, the service isn't of the same standard, the sambar is watery, the servings are much smaller and the prices much higher. They tend to serve cold dishes at times which is irritating. I used to visit this restaurant at least once every two weeks up until 2-3 years back. I think it's been on the downward spiral big time ever since then and although I made pay this restaurant an odd visit, I wouldn't automatically go here when I have a craving for south Indian food considering the number of restaurants that have come up in and around Anna Nagar.<br />
<br />
I hope they realise that they are losing customers soon before it is too late and focus on getting back to the standards they had a few years back. 
                                        <div class="clear"></div>
                </div>
                <div class="rev-text-sm mbot0">
                    <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text-expand " tabindex="0">

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ö" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-5" title="Average" aria-label="Rated 3.0">Rated</div> 
                                            On a rainy day with no choice landed at HSB for office team lunch. Ordered their meals. No comments on food as its same everywhere their customer service was bad, though the restaurant wasn't crowded still the service time was very late. We had to wait for 15 mins to someone to keep water first and then 10 mins again for someone to take order. Rest all was fine. Its spacious and was well maintained.

<div itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope="" itemprop="review" style="display: block;">

    <span itemtype="http://schema.org/Restaurant" itemscope="" itemprop="itemReviewed" style="display:none">
        <span itemprop="name">Hotel Saravana Bhavan, Anna Nagar West, Chennai</span>
    </span>

    <div data-res_id="65499" data-snippet="restaurant-review" data-review_id="25126727" class="  ui segments res-review-body res-review clearfix js-activity-root   item-to-hide-parent stupendousact">
        <div class="ui segment clearfix  brtop ">
            
            <div class="ui warning message error-message-highlight review-message hidden mbot"></div>

            <div class="ui item clearfix ">
                                <div class="item">
                    <div class="clearfix  mb10 ">
                        <div itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope="" itemprop="author" class="res-large-snippet ui horizontal list col-s-16  ">

  <div class="item col-s-16">
    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/Tony225">
            <img data-original="https://b.zmtcdn.com/data/user_profile_pictures/ed8/dcf3be1666009e18a59b5d0e28c25ed8.jpg?fit=around%7C100%3A100&amp;crop=100%3A100%3B%2A%2C%2A" src="https://b.zmtcdn.com/data/user_profile_pictures/ed8/dcf3be1666009e18a59b5d0e28c25ed8.jpg?fit=around%7C100%3A100&amp;crop=100%3A100%3B%2A%2C%2A" alt="Tony" class="ui avatar image left tiny" style="display: block;" />
          </a>


<!--      -->

    <div class="content col-l-11 large-snippet ml5 mt5">

      <div itemprop="name" class="header nowrap ui left">
                  <a data-entity_id="1494694" href="https://www.zomato.com/Tony225">
            Tony
          </a>
                
      </div>
                <div class="clear"></div>

      <span class="grey-text fontsize5 nowrap">

                        
                                            18 Reviews
                                ,
                          88 Followers
                                          
              </span>
        <div class="clear"></div>

                              <div data-is-followed="" data-user-id="1494694" data-entity-type="USER" class="zs-follow-btn-container usr-page-follow-btn clear mt2">
                <a class="social-button follow-social cgrey ui basic large label ui-label-bb zs-follow-user-button" aria-label="Follow" role="button">Follow</a>
            </div>
          
                      </div>

  </div>
</div>

                    </div>
                </div>
                                <div class="fs12px pbot0 clearfix">
                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/pMamQE" class="grey-text">
                        <time datetime="2015-10-04 13:50:51" itemprop="datePublished">Oct 04, 2015</time>
                    </a>

                                        	                    
                </div>
            </div>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 hidden " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="õ" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-4" title="Average" aria-label="Rated 2.5">Rated</div> 
                    Every Sunday we go outside for having Breakfast and today we decided to visit Saravana Bhavan (Anna Nagar Branch) since we were in the locality.<br />
<br />
Waiting for food takes too long and I would say food quality is good but the quantity has gone way down. <br />
For example, I ordered 4 idly's and the chutney they offered was sufficient only to 1 idly. And I requested the waiter to provide some more chutney and I had to wait more than 15 minutes. I have to say that the place was fully packed, but waiting for Chutney 15 minutes is too much to my opinion. Why not provide sufficient amount of side dishes along with the main dish.<br />
Apart from this the food itself was tasty but I lost interest in ordering more since I was not ready to wait another 30 minutes for another dish.<br />
Please fix the waiting hours since other hotel takes not more than 2 to 3 minutes in providing the dish after ordering.<br />
<br />
Idly was good. <br />
Chapatti and Paratha was very soft, but surprised to see the kuruma was not so good.<br />
Pongal was amazing.<br />
There are variety of combo's to choose based on your taste, <br />
<br />
Don't want to wait then take the elevator straight to the Buffet. They have everything which you normally get for breakfast. Full tummy guaranteed, but the cost is too pricey.<br />
<br />
Please fix the quantity of food and waiting hours. This will elevate the restaurant. Because the quality is very good, but i am not ready to wait 15 to 30 min each time after ordering and requesting side dishes for the ordered dish since it was not sufficient and again waiting 15 min just for side dish.<br />
<br />
Will try this Hotel in next Month to see how it goes.
                                        <div class="clear"></div>
                </div>
                <div class="rev-text-sm mbot0">
                    <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text-expand " tabindex="0">
                        <div data-iconr="õ" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-4" title="Average" aria-label="Rated 2.5">Rated</div> 
                        Every Sunday we go outside for having Breakfast and today we decided to visit Saravana Bhavan (Anna Nagar Branch) since we were in the locality.<br />
<br />
Waiting for food takes too long and I would say food quality is good but the quantity has gone way down. <br />
For example, I ordered 4 idly's and the chutney they offered was sufficient only to 1 idly. And I requested the waiter to provide some more chutney and I had to wait more than 15 minutes. I have to say that the place was fully packed, but waiting for Chutney 15 minutes is too much to my opinion. Why not provide sufficient amount of side dishes along with the main dish.<br />
Apart from this the food itself was tasty but I lost interest in ordering more since I was not ready to wait another 30 minutes for another dish.<br />
Please fix the waiting hours since other hotel takes not more than 2 to 3 minutes in providing the dish after ordering.<br />
<br />
Idly was good. <br />
Chapatti and Paratha was very soft, but surprised to see the kuruma...
                                                    <a href="#" class="read-more">read more</a>
                                                <div class="clear"></div>
                    </div>
                </div>

                                            If you want a decent hotel that serves quality vegetarian food, this is surely one of the top option in the locality. The Paneer butter masala I had with Naan was quite good. Nothing special to mention about the hotel setup and ambience as the place is usually crowdy and seating arrangements looks bit congested like normal hotels.

                                <div class="fs12px pbot0 clearfix">
                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/QeYxOM" class="grey-text">

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="õ" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-4" title="Average" aria-label="Rated 2.5">Rated</div> 
                                            I have seen the glorious ups and contemporary lows of this outlet of Saravana bhavan over the last decade. <br />
<br />
Used to be the go to place in Annanagar , it is not anymore. Only the memories of their ghee dripping ghee dosa, awesomatic mini sambar idlies, vegetarian meals still linger in my mind. <br />
<br />
Nowadays most of their food is average to below average. Meals which is now available even in the evening times is the only redeeming factor about this place.
                                                                <br /><br /><a target="_blank" href="https://www.zomato.com/spoonback?u=http%3A%2F%2Fsrirelishes.blogspot.in%2F&amp;r=24722993&amp;to=1777143&amp;k=4a113c6ea023569e3f60b6544b6d63ab"><span class="left red-text">srirelishes.blogspot.com</span><span data-icon="ŧ" class="grey-text left ml5"></span></a>
                                        <div class="clear"></div>
                </div>

<div itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope="" itemprop="review" style="display: block;">

    <span itemtype="http://schema.org/Restaurant" itemscope="" itemprop="itemReviewed" style="display:none">
        <span itemprop="name">Hotel Saravana Bhavan, Anna Nagar West, Chennai</span>
    </span>

    <div data-res_id="65499" data-snippet="restaurant-review" data-review_id="24664069" class="  ui segments res-review-body res-review clearfix js-activity-root   item-to-hide-parent stupendousact">
        <div class="ui segment clearfix  brtop ">
            
            <div class="ui warning message error-message-highlight review-message hidden mbot"></div>

            <div class="ui item clearfix ">
                                <div class="item">
                    <div class="clearfix  mb10 ">
                        <div itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope="" itemprop="author" class="res-large-snippet ui horizontal list col-s-16  ">

  <div class="item col-s-16">
    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/users/ramya-31442959">
            <img data-original="https://b.zmtcdn.com/data/user_profile_pictures/a83/1b680a99469239346e5206d1c794fa83.jpg?fit=around%7C100%3A100&amp;crop=100%3A100%3B%2A%2C%2A" src="https://b.zmtcdn.com/data/user_profile_pictures/a83/1b680a99469239346e5206d1c794fa83.jpg?fit=around%7C100%3A100&amp;crop=100%3A100%3B%2A%2C%2A" alt="Ramya" class="ui avatar image left tiny" style="display: block;" />
          </a>


<!--      -->

    <div class="content col-l-11 large-snippet ml5 mt5">

      <div itemprop="name" class="header nowrap ui left">
                  <a data-entity_id="31442959" href="https://www.zomato.com/users/ramya-31442959">
            Ramya
          </a>
                
      </div>
                <div class="clear"></div>

      <span class="grey-text fontsize5 nowrap">

                        
                                            20 Reviews
                                ,
                          26 Followers
                                          
              </span>
        <div class="clear"></div>

                              <div data-is-followed="" data-user-id="31442959" data-entity-type="USER" class="zs-follow-btn-container usr-page-follow-btn clear mt2">
                <a class="social-button follow-social cgrey ui basic large label ui-label-bb zs-follow-user-button" aria-label="Follow" role="button">Follow</a>
            </div>
          
                      </div>

  </div>
</div>

                    </div>
                </div>
                                <div class="fs12px pbot0 clearfix">
                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/rGKaPB" class="grey-text">
                        <time datetime="2015-08-19 04:32:11" itemprop="datePublished">Aug 19, 2015</time>
                    </a>

                                        	                    
                </div>
            </div>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 hidden " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="õ" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-4" title="Average" aria-label="Rated 2.5">Rated</div> 
                    I mostly stick to this bhavan, when it comes for veggie food. Myself, hubby and cousin arrived for a week-end lunch buffet with sky high expectations after so many reviews on our wedding anniversary. Ambiance and hygiene were well maintained. Served welcome drink and a soup of choice with 2 available options and they tasted good. Starters included a veggie salad, mixed fruit salad, bread and jam, veg seekh kebab, plain vada, pizza and aloo fry. Bread was very dry, so switched to kebab, which was really tasteless (almost a worst kebab i ever had). Aloo fry and vada were good. idlis and dosas which could be ordered in the buffet were good as ever. Main course included roti, butter dhal fry, okra gravy, veg noodles, and pulao and everything tasted good. They don provide pizza and rotis in a plate or a basket and serves a single piece of pizza and 1 roti, which doesn't looks pleasing in a buffet. South-Indian meals along with papads and crsips were available. Desserts included ice-cream of choice with 3 available options, and a watermelon ice (bland and boring). coming to sweets, nothing was aesthetic and exotic. expected for some great milk sweets and ended-up with disappointment. Ended up our lunch by having a perfect filter coffee. felt a bit expensive for the buffet as no dish served is exotic or rich. overall, it was an okay experience:(
                                        <div class="clear"></div>
                </div>
                <div class="rev-text-sm mbot0">
                    <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text-expand " tabindex="0">
                        <div data-iconr="õ" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-4" title="Average" aria-label="Rated 2.5">Rated</div> 
                        I mostly stick to this bhavan, when it comes for veggie food. Myself, hubby and cousin arrived for a week-end lunch buffet with sky high expectations after so many reviews on our wedding anniversary. Ambiance and hygiene were well maintained. Served welcome drink and a soup of choice with 2 available options and they tasted good. Starters included a veggie salad, mixed fruit salad, bread and jam, veg seekh kebab, plain vada, pizza and aloo fry. Bread was very dry, so switched to kebab, which was really tasteless (almost a worst kebab i ever had). Aloo fry and vada were good. idlis and dosas which could be ordered in the buffet were good as ever. Main course included roti, butter dhal fry, okra gravy, veg noodles, and pulao and everything tasted good. They don provide pizza and rotis in a plate or a basket and serves a single piece of pizza and 1 roti, which doesn't looks pleasing in a buffet. South-Indian meals along with papads and crsips were available....

                                <div class="fs12px pbot0 clearfix">
                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/ZOZoBv" class="grey-text">

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ö" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-5" title="Average" aria-label="Rated 3.0">Rated</div> 
                                            Have been eating here right from 2009. The weekend buffet used to be a steal for veggies. Sadly the quality as well as quantity ha e come down drastically. There are still a few items which maintain there old charm. 14 idli aka sambar idli, kothu parotta and kaima idli are still good. Though they are too pricey, it's okay to have occasionally. I find the staff at parcel area to be more attentive and friendly than the ones in the dining area. Meals have become very bad. North Indian thali is okayish now. But that too very pricey for the quality. It's really sad to see them performing like this :(<br />
<br />
*review based on multiple visits over a period of time *
                                                                <br /><br /><a target="_blank" href="https://www.zomato.com/spoonback?u=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.foodpecker.in&amp;r=24326275&amp;to=1595404&amp;k=eb8e823671f987255b2be75e759dece2"><span class="left red-text">foodpecker.in</span><span data-icon="ŧ" class="grey-text left ml5"></span></a>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ó" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-2" title="Poor" aria-label="Rated 1.5">Rated</div> 
                                            Had lunch yesterday at their vellore restaurant. Poor Food and very poor service. Our group of 5 had 3 tamil nadu meals @ Rs 195 and 2 special meals @ rs 240 each. We had to keep repeatedly asking for replenishment before they gave us the same. <br />
<br />
I was a ardent fan of HSB and i swear i will not go there again until i get strong recommendations that they are back in business.<br />
<br />
All five of us had stomach aches after we ate the food.<br />
<br />
sad to see a good restaurant slipping.

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ù" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-7" title="Very Good" aria-label="Rated 4.0">Rated</div> 
                                            As usual liked all the stuffs. Started with lemon coriander soup,masala papad,Gobi 65.. Ordered idli for kiddo.. Wifey ordered for a combo which has a otthappam,parotta and pulav combo. I ordered for pongal to keep myself light. Finally vanilla milkshake for kiddo and coffee for me.. Nice ambience and courteous staff. Should visit on a weekday. Not advisable for weekends.

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ô" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-3" title="Poor" aria-label="Rated 2.0">Rated</div> 
                                            Ambience - 3/5<br />
Food - 3/5<br />
Price - not worth the quantity and quality<br />
Stewards - 1/5<br />
On the whole, it's not a very good experience if you want to enjoy dinner or lunch with your friends or family. Visit this place only to kill your hunger.

                                <div class="fs12px pbot0 clearfix">
                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/ABYQzm" class="grey-text">
                        <time datetime="2015-06-12 10:05:16" itemprop="datePublished">Jun 12, 2015</time>
                    </a>

                                        	                    
                </div>
            </div>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ù" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-7" title="Very Good" aria-label="Rated 4.0">Rated</div> 
                                            HSB as I recall is one of the first restaurants I went to as a kid and 20 years on, I still go to this place.  <br />
HSB will forever remain one of the best South Indian restaurants. The food here is average and it fills your tummy at a reasonable rate. <br />
A good place to head to for a refreshing morning breakfast. 
                                                            <div class="clear"></div>
                </div>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ù" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-7" title="Very Good" aria-label="Rated 4.0">Rated</div> 
                                            HSB is always an option when you run out of places to eat. It was and is my all time favourite, also because I love SI food. I've tried almost everything here and they never disappoint with the food. <br />
During the weekends, its definite to wait for at least 10min to get a table. <br />
<br />
They lack a bit of service appreciation and need to work on it. Also, the bellboys and those who to clean tables, keep wandering around the tables when not necessary, which is quite disturbing while we eat. 
                                                            <div class="clear"></div>
                </div>

                                <div class="fs12px pbot0 clearfix">
                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/NnzNml" class="grey-text">
                        <time datetime="2015-05-29 15:11:19" itemprop="datePublished">May 29, 2015</time>
                    </a>

                                        	                    
                </div>
            </div>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="õ" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-4" title="Average" aria-label="Rated 2.5">Rated</div> 
                                            Used to go here for their paneer butter masala and butter naan. The gobi manchurian is peculiarly white in color and this is a big turn off. The Kothu Parotta is the best dish here.<br />
<br />
The mini meals are simply not good enough. It's priced high and absolutely worthless. The fried rice is always full of cabbage. I have never understood this, but they are probably trying to improve the male hormone.<br />
<br />
Service is extremely poor, the waitstaff aren't  courteous. Go here just for the Paneer and Kothu Parotta.
                                                            <div class="clear"></div>
                </div>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ö" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-5" title="Average" aria-label="Rated 3.0">Rated</div> 
                                            What amazes me about this restaurant is the number of franchises they happen to have -- not just in Chennai but in other continents too! I ordered a ghee-roast masala dosa, which was accompanied by 5 different types of chutney, and to be honest, the dosa was pretty cool. What I didn't like was the fact that a South Indian restaurant, with its root in Chennai, didn't give away a good quantity of the potato vegetable inside the dosa; the proportion was just neglected. 
                                                            <div class="clear"></div>
                </div>

                                <div class="fs12px pbot0 clearfix">
                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/ZxvZvX" class="grey-text">
                        <time datetime="2015-05-12 10:30:40" itemprop="datePublished">May 12, 2015</time>
                    </a>

                                        	                    
                </div>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="è" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-8" title="Excellent" aria-label="Rated 4.5">Rated</div> 
                                            After a long search for Veg Bufffet. we zeroed down to HSB in Anna Nagar. Even through I am regular visitor of this hotel for its Awesome Meals, Tiffin  and Chart items in the Ground floor particularly Pav Bajji and Coffee, this is the first time I went for Buffet Dinner. the Items was limited they serve mini Juice and Soup on the table and rest we can take, and they have 3 to 4 dry items gopi  manjurian, breads, bun butter jams, veg roals, Nans, Side dishes , veg pulav, jeera rice, white rice, sambar, rasam , curd rice, Pani puries Ice creams and even we can order idlies , Dosas and Coffee and the cost is Just Rs.300/- A Must try..... for every one.
                                                                <br /><br /><a target="_blank" href="https://www.zomato.com/spoonback?u=https%3A%2F%2Fvijayslsl.wordpress.com%2F&amp;r=23629441&amp;to=18442&amp;k=2939ad10a3aaee307ef84876cb9581ff"><span class="left red-text">vijayslsl.wordpress.com</span><span data-icon="ŧ" class="grey-text left ml5"></span></a>

They wouldnt clean the vessels even n argue upon asking him to get another glass or plate..! They are the worst set of ppl i hav ever come across..! Never ever enter tis place..!

                                <div class="fs12px pbot0 clearfix">
                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/MeooMl" class="grey-text">
                        <time datetime="2015-05-02 16:44:26" itemprop="datePublished">May 02, 2015</time>
                    </a>

                                        	                    
                </div>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ò" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-1" title="Poor" aria-label="Rated 1.0">Rated</div> 
                                            We came here last evening after a family function of 13th death day of my aunt and were very hungry and exhausted. We are from bangalore and were told a lot about this joint by our cousins. We all (20 of us) came here at around 6pm and went to the first floor. We were made to stand there for 15 mins even thought the entire restaurant was empty. <br />
There was one designated corner that was allowed for even sitting. <br />
Later while ordering the steward when very rude and arrogant. He behaved as if he gave away free food. Really bad of them to not show any resect to the customers. The food was okay but the behaviour of the staff made it a even more pathetic place.<br />
 I would really recommend to stay hungry rather than have food at such a unprofessional and horrible place <br />

                                                            <div class="clear"></div>
                </div>

                                <div class="fs12px pbot0 clearfix">
                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/PaRdeo" class="grey-text">
                        <time datetime="2015-04-11 01:28:27" itemprop="datePublished">Apr 11, 2015</time>
                    </a>

                                        	                    
                </div>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ø" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-6" title="Good" aria-label="Rated 3.5">Rated</div> 
                                            This was my favorite veg restaurant in chennai for the past 13years....  I have visited almost all branches in chennai city limit... Tastewise not much difference across branches...Their meals, kara dosai, appam chops, parotta,  sambar/curd vada, variety dosa, mushroom biriyani and filter coffee are my favorite...their service was quick... Not too expensive... But lately this hotel has lost its taste ...its quality is degrading day by day.... My rating is for the current taste and service otherwise I would give +1 the HSB of old....<br />

                                                            <div class="clear"></div>
                </div>

                                <div class="fs12px pbot0 clearfix">
                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/gXMXQy" class="grey-text">
                        <time datetime="2015-04-08 14:49:08" itemprop="datePublished">Apr 08, 2015</time>
                    </a>

                                        	                    
                </div>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ö" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-5" title="Average" aria-label="Rated 3.0">Rated</div> 
                                            Used to be my favorite hotel when I was a kid. Almost every weekend I would make it a point to go with my family for atleast one meal. Their mini idli, sambar, vada,dosa and meals used to be my favorite. Manchurian items are really bad. No way I can eat it there. They have their own sweet stall and bakery and have fresh cream cakes too. Not all that great. Personally feel the cleanliness and standards have come down in almost all outlet's. Need to improve alot. Dedicated people still go there but times are changing.. New places are all around the corner. Its high time to buck up.<br />
<span><a href="https://www.zomato.com/users/evan-2411408" class="at-tags at-tags-2411408">Evan</a></span>

    <span itemtype="http://schema.org/Restaurant" itemscope="" itemprop="itemReviewed" style="display:none">
        <span itemprop="name">Hotel Saravana Bhavan, Anna Nagar West, Chennai</span>
    </span>

    <div data-res_id="65499" data-snippet="restaurant-review" data-review_id="23323766" class="  ui segments res-review-body res-review clearfix js-activity-root   item-to-hide-parent stupendousact">
        <div class="ui segment clearfix  brtop ">
            
            <div class="ui warning message error-message-highlight review-message hidden mbot"></div>

            <div class="ui item clearfix ">
                                <div class="item">
                    <div class="clearfix  mb10 ">
                        <div itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope="" itemprop="author" class="res-large-snippet ui horizontal list col-s-16  ">

  <div class="item col-s-16">
    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/RajeshHari">
            <img data-original="https://b.zmtcdn.com/data/user_profile_pictures/416/1bf00a5a6e5dea2c612bb0e9e9a3f416.jpg?fit=around%7C100%3A100&amp;crop=100%3A100%3B%2A%2C%2A" src="https://b.zmtcdn.com/images/placeholder_200.png" alt="Rajesh Hari" class="ui avatar image left tiny" />
          </a>


<!--      -->

    <div class="content col-l-11 large-snippet ml5 mt5">

      <div itemprop="name" class="header nowrap ui left">
                  <a data-entity_id="199473" href="https://www.zomato.com/RajeshHari">
            Rajesh Hari
          </a>
                
      </div>
                <div class="clear"></div>

      <span class="grey-text fontsize5 nowrap">

                        
                                            100 Reviews
                                ,
                          329 Followers
                                          
              </span>
        <div class="clear"></div>

                              <div data-is-followed="" data-user-id="199473" data-entity-type="USER" class="zs-follow-btn-container usr-page-follow-btn clear mt2">
                <a class="social-button follow-social cgrey ui basic large label ui-label-bb zs-follow-user-button" aria-label="Follow" role="button">Follow</a>

                                <div class="fs12px pbot0 clearfix">
                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/RBdDAk" class="grey-text">
                        <time datetime="2015-04-07 19:14:22" itemprop="datePublished">Apr 07, 2015</time>
                    </a>

                                        	                    
                </div>
            </div>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ö" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-5" title="Average" aria-label="Rated 3.0">Rated</div> 
                                            A once popular hotel . It has lost most of its former glory when it comes to quality of their food. The multi leveled hotel has a restaurants, bakery, sweet store all packed together . The ground floor is a bakery/sweet store with seats for dining in . The first floor is a non A/c restaurant, the second is a A/c restaurant better ambiance that the first floor . Then , there is a third floor only buffet restaurant. The fifth floor is a rooftop restaurant which is no dream considering the chennai heat even during winter . The food quality has declined from the past and the management hardly seems to care about it anymore , probably since they have already become richer beyond their wildest dreams . I'd rate it a 3.0 just for the A/c second floor restaurant which seems to have good service but I wouldn't rate it any more than 3.0 which is generous considering their current precarious state 
                                                            <div class="clear"></div>
                </div>

        <span itemprop="name">Hotel Saravana Bhavan, Anna Nagar West, Chennai</span>

    <div data-res_id="65499" data-snippet="restaurant-review" data-review_id="23320490" class="  ui segments res-review-body res-review clearfix js-activity-root   item-to-hide-parent stupendousact">
        <div class="ui segment clearfix  brtop ">
            
            <div class="ui warning message error-message-highlight review-message hidden mbot"></div>

            <div class="ui item clearfix ">
                                <div class="item">
                    <div class="clearfix  mb10 ">
                        <div itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope="" itemprop="author" class="res-large-snippet ui horizontal list col-s-16  ">

  <div class="item col-s-16">
    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/AmrythBunty">
            <img data-original="https://b.zmtcdn.com/data/user_profile_pictures/a70/541e8630d36bd4ff966315f91139fa70.jpg?fit=around%7C100%3A100&amp;crop=100%3A100%3B%2A%2C%2A" src="https://b.zmtcdn.com/data/user_profile_pictures/a70/541e8630d36bd4ff966315f91139fa70.jpg?fit=around%7C100%3A100&amp;crop=100%3A100%3B%2A%2C%2A" alt="AmrYth Bunty" class="ui avatar image left tiny" style="display: block;" />
          </a>


<!--      -->

    <div class="content col-l-11 large-snippet ml5 mt5">

      <div itemprop="name" class="header nowrap ui left">
                  <a data-entity_id="152824" href="https://www.zomato.com/AmrythBunty">
            AmrYth Bunty
          </a>
                
      </div>
                <div class="export-label left white ml5">
          Expert in Anna Nagar West
        </div>
                <div class="clear"></div>

      <span class="grey-text fontsize5 nowrap">

                        
                                            93 Reviews
                                ,
                          576 Followers
                                          
              </span>
        <div class="clear"></div>

                              <div data-is-followed="" data-user-id="152824" data-entity-type="USER" class="zs-follow-btn-container usr-page-follow-btn clear mt2">
                <a class="social-button follow-social cgrey ui basic large label ui-label-bb zs-follow-user-button" aria-label="Follow" role="button">Follow</a>

                                <div class="fs12px pbot0 clearfix">
                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/xOyLDP" class="grey-text">
                        <time datetime="2015-04-07 00:41:01" itemprop="datePublished">Apr 07, 2015</time>
                    </a>

                                        	                    
                </div>
            </div>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 hidden " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ø" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-6" title="Good" aria-label="Rated 3.5">Rated</div> 
                    HSB will always remain a legacy amongst the south indians who prefer to stick with it , no matter how many ever new restos pop up. But the prices seems to be growing at a higher rate than the inflation and the quantity decreasing at a rapid pace which had made the other part of the crowd to shift thier choise to other restos which serve in good quantity with decent price.<br />
<br />
There was a time when the prices where at its peak and ppl stopped goin to HSB, one fine day HSB realised and dropped its price by 25% which was a happy news but dissapointingly kept the quantity very low which never made the mummies and tummies happy and the situation is still the same.<br />
<br />
As it was near my place , family decide to drop in, ordered various items, all were decent except for the paneer tikka which was the worst of the lot. Too much grilled up, litterally burnt. And the most heartening part was Sweet lime which was shockingly priced @ 120 bucks for just 250 ml. No mercy at all seriously. My bad didnt see the rate before i ordered it.<br />
<br />
The place is really huge but still deadly crowded in the weekends and u cant expect a quick service during this time, but still somehow they manage.<br />
Have tried the buffet earlier which is defy VFM compared to al a carte. The evening snacks here too is awesome. They also have chats , sweets and bakery stuffs in the ground floor.
                                        <div class="clear"></div>
                </div>
                <div class="rev-text-sm mbot0">
                    <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text-expand " tabindex="0">
                        <div data-iconr="ø" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-6" title="Good" aria-label="Rated 3.5">Rated</div> 
                        HSB will always remain a legacy amongst the south indians who prefer to stick with it , no matter how many ever new restos pop up. But the prices seems to be growing at a higher rate than the inflation and the quantity decreasing at a rapid pace which had made the other part of the crowd to shift thier choise to other restos which serve in good quantity with decent price.<br />
<br />
There was a time when the prices where at its peak and ppl stopped goin to HSB, one fine day HSB realised and dropped its price by 25% which was a happy news but dissapointingly kept the quantity very low which never made the mummies and tummies happy and the situation is still the same.<br />
<br />
As it was near my place , family decide to drop in, ordered various items, all were decent except for the paneer tikka which was the worst of the lot. Too much grilled up, litterally burnt. And the most heartening part was Sweet lime which was shockingly priced @ 120 bucks for just 250 ml. No mercy at all...

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ù" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-7" title="Very Good" aria-label="Rated 4.0">Rated</div> 
                                            Saravana Bhavan has been in Anna Nagar for a very long time and the food is super delicious.<br />
<br />
Especially the sambar... simply irresistibly finger licking good. Prices have gone up during recent times, but so is the case everywhere else!<br />
<br />
I make it a point not to visit too often lest it should get too monotonous.

    <div data-res_id="65499" data-snippet="restaurant-review" data-review_id="6490319" class="  ui segments res-review-body res-review clearfix js-activity-root   item-to-hide-parent stupendousact">
        <div class="ui segment clearfix  brtop ">
            
            <div class="ui warning message error-message-highlight review-message hidden mbot"></div>

            <div class="ui item clearfix ">
                                <div class="item">
                    <div class="clearfix  mb10 ">
                        <div itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope="" itemprop="author" class="res-large-snippet ui horizontal list col-s-16  ">

  <div class="item col-s-16">
    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/users/karthik-arvind-kumar-417011">
            <img data-original="https://b.zmtcdn.com/data/user_profile_pictures/e58/b09e993d37e818f4df5400ccc9096e58.jpg?fit=around%7C100%3A100&amp;crop=100%3A100%3B%2A%2C%2A" src="https://b.zmtcdn.com/data/user_profile_pictures/e58/b09e993d37e818f4df5400ccc9096e58.jpg?fit=around%7C100%3A100&amp;crop=100%3A100%3B%2A%2C%2A" alt="Karthik Arvind Kumar" class="ui avatar image left tiny" style="display: block;" />
          </a>


<!--      -->

    <div class="content col-l-11 large-snippet ml5 mt5">

      <div itemprop="name" class="header nowrap ui left">
                  <a data-entity_id="417011" href="https://www.zomato.com/users/karthik-arvind-kumar-417011">
            Karthik Arvind Kumar
          </a>
                
      </div>
                <div class="clear"></div>

      <span class="grey-text fontsize5 nowrap">

                        
                                            5 Reviews
                                ,
                          74 Followers
                                          
              </span>
        <div class="clear"></div>

                              <div data-is-followed="" data-user-id="417011" data-entity-type="USER" class="zs-follow-btn-container usr-page-follow-btn clear mt2">
                <a class="social-button follow-social cgrey ui basic large label ui-label-bb zs-follow-user-button" aria-label="Follow" role="button">Follow</a>

  </div>

                    </div>

                                <div class="fs12px pbot0 clearfix">
                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/bqAqBY" class="grey-text">
                        <time datetime="2014-12-27 00:26:19" itemprop="datePublished">Dec 27, 2014</time>
                    </a>

                                        	                    
                </div>
            </div>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ø" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-6" title="Good" aria-label="Rated 3.5">Rated</div> 
                                            You don't get to establish franchises all over the world without being one of the best South Indian vegetarian restaurants. Frankly, I don't know who will even come and check out reviews for this establishment! This HSB is one of the oldest standing HSBs, evident from the vintage blue-nameboard that it still has. It is everyone's go to place for a quick light meal. Good luck finding a table to sit on weekends, especially on Sunday mornings! Definitely one of the HSBs which has the upper hand in the city! If only they made customer service a bit more smooth and quick.
                                                            <div class="clear"></div>
                </div>
            
            
            
                                    
                                                
                
		<div aria-label="Like" data-likes="3" data-reviewid="6490319" data-active="1" data-action="like" class="left mr5 ui tiny labeled button js-btn-thank">
			<div data-icon="f" class="compact ui tiny button ">

                    <div data-iconr="ù" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-7" title="Very Good" aria-label="Rated 4.0">Rated</div> 
                                            I have been to Hotel Saravana Bhavan(HSB) many a times. I went to HSB @ Anna nagar west with my colleague from Mumbai. He was more interested in trying South Indian dishes and absolute choice for which was HSB.<br />
We ordered for South Indian Special meal. Typical look and taste. He was overjoyed on seeing the variety and absolutely enjoyed the taste. I, of course, have tasted it many a times earlier and love it.<br />
Overall: Thumbs Up for South Indian Meals :)

    <div class="content col-l-11 large-snippet ml5 mt5">

      <div itemprop="name" class="header nowrap ui left">

      <span class="grey-text fontsize5 nowrap">

                        
                                            6 Reviews

                              <div data-is-followed="" data-user-id="1024564" data-entity-type="USER" class="zs-follow-btn-container usr-page-follow-btn clear mt2">

                                <div class="fs12px pbot0 clearfix">
                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/PkDLPX" class="grey-text">
                        <time datetime="2014-11-24 19:43:41" itemprop="datePublished">Nov 24, 2014</time>
                    </a>

                                        	                    
                </div>
            </div>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ö" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-5" title="Average" aria-label="Rated 3.0">Rated</div> 
                                            For a very long time I wanted to try their Buffet. I got a chance and went there not expecting nothing great but decent food. Now coming  to the food, it was ok, Their cucumber soup was good, starters was ok, in main course their shanghai fried rice and vegetable Manchurian was the best dish of the day, It was good, Noodles wasn't good. Stuffed capsicum was good especially the gravy. Paneer Manchurian was ok. Ordered Dosa as well as nan, Dosa was good, nan was cold and rubbery. For desert i had flavoured whipped cream was good and chocolate pastry which was good, it had hazlenut which i liked. At last the ice cream which i personally feel not good. Overall the food was ok if you want to just fill your stomach for Rs.300+vat i.e
                                                            <div class="clear"></div>
                </div>
            
            
            
                                    
                                                
                
		<div aria-label="Like" data-likes="" data-reviewid="5905531" data-active="1" data-action="like" class="left mr5 ui tiny labeled button js-btn-thank">

                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/AnBGBq" class="grey-text">
                        <time datetime="2014-10-29 14:15:06" itemprop="datePublished">Oct 29, 2014</time>
                    </a>

                                        	                    
                </div>
            </div>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ù" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-7" title="Very Good" aria-label="Rated 4.0">Rated</div> 
                                            For me, the best dosas in Chennai. Their Rava Onion Dosa is matchless. Perfect for an early breakfast. Sadly home delivery is pretty lousy. Do try out the ghee pongal as well.

                                <div class="fs12px pbot0 clearfix">
                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/PXQgGd" class="grey-text">

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ö" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-5" title="Average" aria-label="Rated 3.0">Rated</div> 
                                            I avoid going to this place. It's cramped, all I hear is people chewing their food, the cutlery, the service is ok, and the food is just too pricey for the quantity. It's famous for the quality, but that too is deteriorating with time. So it comes down to this, I paid more money for less food which is not of top quality. I liked the pongal. I would go only if somebody drags me there!
                                                            <div class="clear"></div>
                </div>

    <span itemtype="http://schema.org/Restaurant" itemscope="" itemprop="itemReviewed" style="display:none">

                        <div itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope="" itemprop="author" class="res-large-snippet ui horizontal list col-s-16  ">

                                <div class="fs12px pbot0 clearfix">
                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/XnENry" class="grey-text">
                        <time datetime="2014-10-07 16:11:44" itemprop="datePublished">Oct 07, 2014</time>
                    </a>

                                        	                    
                </div>
            </div>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ø" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-6" title="Good" aria-label="Rated 3.5">Rated</div> 
                                            I've been to this outlet many many times and have had take away a zillion times. Their specialty lies in their tiffin items. The dosas, idiyappams, parotas, aapams are all delicious. Sambar and chutneys are good. But I love the veg kurma and chana gravy that accompanies the parotas. Prices are slightly on the higher side, but the quality and hygiene factors make it worth every buck. I had the thali meals for dinner once and it was such a dampener. The vegetables, kuzhambu and sambar made at home taste way better than what they had to offer that particular day. Maybe I should have just stuck to the tiffin items. <br />
<br />
Coffee is good and so are the sweets. The best however are their murukus.
                                                            <div class="clear"></div>
                </div>

    <div class="content col-l-11 large-snippet ml5 mt5">

      <div itemprop="name" class="header nowrap ui left">

                                <div class="fs12px pbot0 clearfix">
                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/XnQNmo" class="grey-text">
                        <time datetime="2014-10-05 08:16:12" itemprop="datePublished">Oct 05, 2014</time>
                    </a>

                                        	                    
                </div>
            </div>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="õ" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-4" title="Average" aria-label="Rated 2.5">Rated</div> 
                                            Visited saravana bhavan, my favourite veg restaurant, after a long long time. The amount of pleasant memories i share with this restaurant made me go there with a lot of expectations.<br />
Once i went inside thinking i need to wait to get a place, i was shocked to see the restaurant half empty. This is when i understood, this isn't the same place i used to love a few years ago.<br />
The handwash area wasn't clean. Water was leaking from two out of the three taps.<br />
<br />
Food : Food , though not upto the standard they have set, was good. Ghee pongal was tasty and had lots of ghee, idiyappam was soft. But the ghee roast, which costs 110 , wasn't crispy, nor did it have the same amount of ghee in it. <br />
<br />
Service : as it wasn't crowded, service was good. But i ordered for ghee roast thinking it was 70rs, but in the bill it was given ₹110. When asked he said it was ghee roast large which i did not mention.<br />
<br />
Overall , it was a disappointing experience.maybe because i went in with lots of expectations. 
                                                            <div class="clear"></div>
                </div>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ò" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-1" title="Poor" aria-label="Rated 1.0">Rated</div> 
                                            To say d least Its not a restaurant ..its a mess !!<br />
I went with my wife.. we sat on oneside of a table for 4.. to our surprise 2 persons( not related to each other) came &amp; sat in front of us ( upon instruction of waiter)..  they finished their food fast &amp; went.. which was followed by another set of 2 people... what is this? They claim they have restaurants overseas. . Then why they r running mess here..<br />
 Service is poor. . Food is mediocre...<br />
