<div itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope="" itemprop="review" style="display: block;">

    <span itemtype="http://schema.org/Restaurant" itemscope="" itemprop="itemReviewed" style="display:none">
        <span itemprop="name">Hotel Saravana Bhavan, Anna Nagar West, Chennai</span>
    </span>

    <div data-res_id="65499" data-snippet="restaurant-review" data-review_id="2966481" class="  ui segments res-review-body res-review clearfix js-activity-root   item-to-hide-parent stupendousact">
        <div class="ui segment clearfix  brtop ">
            
            <div class="ui warning message error-message-highlight review-message hidden mbot"></div>

            <div class="ui item clearfix ">
                                <div class="item">
                    <div class="clearfix  mb10 ">
                        <div itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope="" itemprop="author" class="res-large-snippet ui horizontal list col-s-16  ">

  <div class="item col-s-16">
    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/karthi">
            <img data-original="https://b.zmtcdn.com/data/user_profile_pictures/144/cafeb0b457a77cf9f662d7f2e6f11144.jpg?fit=around%7C100%3A100&amp;crop=100%3A100%3B%2A%2C%2A" src="https://b.zmtcdn.com/data/user_profile_pictures/144/cafeb0b457a77cf9f662d7f2e6f11144.jpg?fit=around%7C100%3A100&amp;crop=100%3A100%3B%2A%2C%2A" alt="Karthick Subramonian" class="ui avatar image left tiny" style="display: block;" />
          </a>


<!--      -->

    <div class="content col-l-11 large-snippet ml5 mt5">

      <div itemprop="name" class="header nowrap ui left">
                  <a data-entity_id="2575434" href="https://www.zomato.com/karthi">
            Karthick Subramonian
          </a>
                
      </div>
                <div class="clear"></div>

      <span class="grey-text fontsize5 nowrap">

                        
                                            66 Reviews
                                ,
                          146 Followers
                                          
              </span>
        <div class="clear"></div>

                              <div data-is-followed="" data-user-id="2575434" data-entity-type="USER" class="zs-follow-btn-container usr-page-follow-btn clear mt2">
                <a class="social-button follow-social cgrey ui basic large label ui-label-bb zs-follow-user-button" aria-label="Follow" role="button">Follow</a>
            </div>
          
                      </div>

  </div>
</div>

                    </div>
                </div>
                                <div class="fs12px pbot0 clearfix">
                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/qvMPnB" class="grey-text">
                        <time datetime="2014-09-07 14:51:49" itemprop="datePublished">Sep 07, 2014</time>
                    </a>

                                        	                    
                </div>
            </div>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ö" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-5" title="Average" aria-label="Rated 3.0">Rated</div> 
                                            Went on a Saturday afternoon for their Buffet.<br />
<br />
They had a welcome drink, two soups,  crispy fried vegetables, vegetable bajji, naan, dosa, roti, some gobi side dish, veg pizza, panner fried rice, rice with sambar, noodles, vegetables, adai pradhamam, curd rice, papad, ice cream, pudding and a few sweets as desserts and a few other dishes too.<br />
<br />
The taste was good, but not upto the mark of usual Saravana Bhavan taste. The main problem was that none of the food items were hot. Some of the items were kept randomly that each time you went to fill your plate, you could find a new item.<br />
<br />
Some of the dishes like Adai Pradamam and the desserts were good, though the absence of hot food didn't give a very filling feeling.<br />
<br />
To pay the bill using card had to go to the floor below. The ambience was decent, but would have been good if it was better.<br />
<br />
Still, felt it was a good buffet for the cost of Rs. 300
                                                            <div class="clear"></div>
                </div>
            
            
            
                                    
                                                
                
		<div aria-label="Like" data-likes="" data-reviewid="2966481" data-active="1" data-action="like" class="left mr5 ui tiny labeled button js-btn-thank">
			<div data-icon="f" class="compact ui tiny button ">
								<span>Like</span>

                                            Before all the other restaurants cropped up in blue star, this was we came to every time. It was the time when saravana bhavan was known foremost for its hygiene. I am disappointed after my recent visit. Hygiene, what they once stood for is absent at the buffet section. Spoons lying around, dirty floor, plates not being cleared from our tables, dirty wash basins and restrooms. Please never come here under the impression that it is as good as before.

                                <div class="fs12px pbot0 clearfix">
                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/kzNPN" class="grey-text">
                        <time datetime="2014-07-24 01:39:03" itemprop="datePublished">Jul 24, 2014</time>
                    </a>

                                        	                    
                </div>
            </div>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ö" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-5" title="Average" aria-label="Rated 3.0">Rated</div> 
                                            Short Review for HSB Snack Buffet:<br />
Priced at Rs. 100, it’s a VFM offer. But don’t go expecting the usual HSB fare. HSB has gone down of late, and it is evident from the quality of this buffet. Average tasting snack items that are not even warmed up clearly shows just how interested they’re in offering this.<br />
<br />
Good for snacking, average to below average taste, value for money, poor quality all make this a hit or miss item.<br />
Overall: 3 / 5
                                                                <br /><br /><a target="_blank" href="https://www.zomato.com/spoonback?u=http%3A%2F%2Ftechiefoodie.in&amp;r=1033712&amp;to=533299&amp;k=591f61154461190e5db9fb3546991fff"><span class="left red-text">techiefoodie.in</span><span data-icon="ŧ" class="grey-text left ml5"></span></a>

                                <div class="fs12px pbot0 clearfix">
                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/OqLQo" class="grey-text">

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ø" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-6" title="Good" aria-label="Rated 3.5">Rated</div> 
                                            This chain is very famous in Chennai. Its quite expensive compared to the other South Indian restaurant. The ambiance and staff are good. The food is excellent. And I am talking about south indian food. You cannot expect an above average north indian food in a south indian restaurant, even though they have it in their menu. Also, the service for south indian food is faster ;)
                                                            <div class="clear"></div>
                </div>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ù" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-7" title="Very Good" aria-label="Rated 4.0">Rated</div> 
                                            One of the places to be if you want to have a 'HOME LIKE' southindian food. The ambience is the thing they can improve on . The dosa and idiyapum are yum !!!!!

                                <div class="fs12px pbot0 clearfix">
                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/kzNPN" class="grey-text">

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ö" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-5" title="Average" aria-label="Rated 3.0">Rated</div> 
                                            Short Review for HSB Snack Buffet:<br />
Priced at Rs. 100, it’s a VFM offer. But don’t go expecting the usual HSB fare. HSB has gone down of late, and it is evident from the quality of this buffet. Average tasting snack items that are not even warmed up clearly shows just how interested they’re in offering this.<br />
<br />
Good for snacking, average to below average taste, value for money, poor quality all make this a hit or miss item.<br />
Overall: 3 / 5
                                                                <br /><br /><a target="_blank" href="https://www.zomato.com/spoonback?u=http%3A%2F%2Ftechiefoodie.in&amp;r=1033712&amp;to=533299&amp;k=591f61154461190e5db9fb3546991fff"><span class="left red-text">techiefoodie.in</span><span data-icon="ŧ" class="grey-text left ml5"></span></a>

                                <div class="fs12px pbot0 clearfix">
                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/OqLQo" class="grey-text">
                        <time datetime="2014-07-23 12:26:01" itemprop="datePublished">Jul 23, 2014</time>
                    </a>

                                        	                    
                </div>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ø" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-6" title="Good" aria-label="Rated 3.5">Rated</div> 
                                            This chain is very famous in Chennai. Its quite expensive compared to the other South Indian restaurant. The ambiance and staff are good. The food is excellent. And I am talking about south indian food. You cannot expect an above average north indian food in a south indian restaurant, even though they have it in their menu. Also, the service for south indian food is faster ;)
                                                            <div class="clear"></div>
                </div>

                                <div class="fs12px pbot0 clearfix">
                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/kzNPN" class="grey-text">
                        <time datetime="2014-07-24 01:39:03" itemprop="datePublished">Jul 24, 2014</time>
                    </a>

                                        	                    
                </div>
            </div>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ö" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-5" title="Average" aria-label="Rated 3.0">Rated</div> 
                                            Short Review for HSB Snack Buffet:<br />
Priced at Rs. 100, it’s a VFM offer. But don’t go expecting the usual HSB fare. HSB has gone down of late, and it is evident from the quality of this buffet. Average tasting snack items that are not even warmed up clearly shows just how interested they’re in offering this.<br />
<br />
Good for snacking, average to below average taste, value for money, poor quality all make this a hit or miss item.<br />
Overall: 3 / 5
                                                                <br /><br /><a target="_blank" href="https://www.zomato.com/spoonback?u=http%3A%2F%2Ftechiefoodie.in&amp;r=1033712&amp;to=533299&amp;k=591f61154461190e5db9fb3546991fff"><span class="left red-text">techiefoodie.in</span><span data-icon="ŧ" class="grey-text left ml5"></span></a>

                                <div class="fs12px pbot0 clearfix">
                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/OqLQo" class="grey-text">
                        <time datetime="2014-07-23 12:26:01" itemprop="datePublished">Jul 23, 2014</time>
                    </a>

                                        	                    
                </div>
            </div>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ø" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-6" title="Good" aria-label="Rated 3.5">Rated</div> 
                                            This chain is very famous in Chennai. Its quite expensive compared to the other South Indian restaurant. The ambiance and staff are good. The food is excellent. And I am talking about south indian food. You cannot expect an above average north indian food in a south indian restaurant, even though they have it in their menu. Also, the service for south indian food is faster ;)
                                                            <div class="clear"></div>
                </div>

    <div data-res_id="65499" data-snippet="restaurant-review" data-review_id="1002289" class="  ui segments res-review-body res-review clearfix js-activity-root   item-to-hide-parent stupendousact">
        <div class="ui segment clearfix  brtop ">
            
            <div class="ui warning message error-message-highlight review-message hidden mbot"></div>

            <div class="ui item clearfix ">
                                <div class="item">
                    <div class="clearfix  mb10 ">
                        <div itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope="" itemprop="author" class="res-large-snippet ui horizontal list col-s-16  ">

  <div class="item col-s-16">
    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/strongcritic">
            <img data-original="https://b.zmtcdn.com/data/user_profile_pictures/1e8/394edb544bf3c4d482baec87341801e8.jpg?fit=around%7C100%3A100&amp;crop=100%3A100%3B%2A%2C%2A" src="https://b.zmtcdn.com/data/user_profile_pictures/1e8/394edb544bf3c4d482baec87341801e8.jpg?fit=around%7C100%3A100&amp;crop=100%3A100%3B%2A%2C%2A" alt="Rahat Adeni" class="ui avatar image left tiny" style="display: block;" />
          </a>


<!--      -->

    <div class="content col-l-11 large-snippet ml5 mt5">

      <div itemprop="name" class="header nowrap ui left">
                  <a data-entity_id="1551925" href="https://www.zomato.com/strongcritic">
            Rahat Adeni
          </a>
                
      </div>
                <div class="clear"></div>

      <span class="grey-text fontsize5 nowrap">

                        
                                            17 Reviews
                                ,
                          132 Followers
                                          
              </span>
        <div class="clear"></div>

                              <div data-is-followed="" data-user-id="1551925" data-entity-type="USER" class="zs-follow-btn-container usr-page-follow-btn clear mt2">
                <a class="social-button follow-social cgrey ui basic large label ui-label-bb zs-follow-user-button" aria-label="Follow" role="button">Follow</a>

  </div>

                    </div>

                                <div class="fs12px pbot0 clearfix">
                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/DyqDL" class="grey-text">
                        <time datetime="2014-07-12 22:56:56" itemprop="datePublished">Jul 12, 2014</time>
                    </a>

                                        	                    
                </div>
            </div>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ô" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-3" title="Poor" aria-label="Rated 2.0">Rated</div> 
                                            An average restaurant. The coffee is tasty treat. Something am fond of this restaurant is the chilly parota but I don't know why, it has lost its flavour. They sometimes serve you stale food which you have to get it replaced. The waiters here sometimes react as if they own the whole restaurant when asked for replacement. During the peak hours you get treated as if you're here for free food. And the way the head server or supervisor makes you wait is irritating. Take away is even worse. You get treated as if you've mean no importance to the restaurant. customer satisfaction is minimal but the only upside is the taste of the food. If you're lucky to be served fresh food that is. Wouldn't recommend if you want to hang out after a tiresome day.
                                                            <div class="clear"></div>
                </div>
            
            
            
                                    
                                                
                
		<div aria-label="Like" data-likes="1" data-reviewid="1002289" data-active="1" data-action="like" class="left mr5 ui tiny labeled button js-btn-thank">

								<span>Like</span>
							</div>
			<div aria-label="1 Likes" data-action_type="REVIEW" data-action_id="1002289" class="ui basic label  stats-thanks js-thank-count js-activity-like-count ">
				1
			</div>
		</div>

<div itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope="" itemprop="review" style="display: block;">

    <span itemtype="http://schema.org/Restaurant" itemscope="" itemprop="itemReviewed" style="display:none">
        <span itemprop="name">Hotel Saravana Bhavan, Anna Nagar West, Chennai</span>
    </span>

    <div data-res_id="65499" data-snippet="restaurant-review" data-review_id="991854" class="  ui segments res-review-body res-review clearfix js-activity-root   item-to-hide-parent stupendousact">
        <div class="ui segment clearfix  brtop ">
            
            <div class="ui warning message error-message-highlight review-message hidden mbot"></div>

            <div class="ui item clearfix ">
                                <div class="item">
                    <div class="clearfix  mb10 ">
                        <div itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope="" itemprop="author" class="res-large-snippet ui horizontal list col-s-16  ">

  <div class="item col-s-16">
    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/users/shankar-raman-764722">
            <img data-original="https://b.zmtcdn.com/data/user_profile_pictures/cae/db52bb4e2aeec75f8cc9332f6b0e2cae.jpg?fit=around%7C100%3A100&amp;crop=100%3A100%3B%2A%2C%2A" src="https://b.zmtcdn.com/data/user_profile_pictures/cae/db52bb4e2aeec75f8cc9332f6b0e2cae.jpg?fit=around%7C100%3A100&amp;crop=100%3A100%3B%2A%2C%2A" alt="Shankar Raman" class="ui avatar image left tiny" style="display: block;" />
          </a>


<!--      -->

    <div class="content col-l-11 large-snippet ml5 mt5">

      <div itemprop="name" class="header nowrap ui left">
                  <a data-entity_id="764722" href="https://www.zomato.com/users/shankar-raman-764722">
            Shankar Raman
          </a>
                
      </div>
                <div class="clear"></div>

      <span class="grey-text fontsize5 nowrap">

                        
                                            1 Review
                                ,
                          26 Followers
                                          
              </span>
        <div class="clear"></div>

                              <div data-is-followed="" data-user-id="764722" data-entity-type="USER" class="zs-follow-btn-container usr-page-follow-btn clear mt2">
                <a class="social-button follow-social cgrey ui basic large label ui-label-bb zs-follow-user-button" aria-label="Follow" role="button">Follow</a>
            </div>
          
                      </div>

  </div>
</div>

                    </div>
                </div>
                                <div class="fs12px pbot0 clearfix">
                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/LyZNK" class="grey-text">
                        <time datetime="2014-07-08 21:39:37" itemprop="datePublished">Jul 08, 2014</time>
                    </a>

                                        	                    
                </div>
            </div>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 hidden " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ò" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-1" title="Poor" aria-label="Rated 1.0">Rated</div> 
                    AVOID SARAVANA BHAVAN! HORRIBLE SERVICE!<br />
<br />
The moment you sit down to order food at Saravana bhavan, their staff makes you feel like you're here for free food. Let greetings alone, the waiters are just RUDE. I only occasionally go to any of their branches, and this time I understood why I don't visit this place often. So we went in to the A/C hall and ordered for 2 meals, 2 dosas and vada (their Non-A/C hall is worse). We ordered for vegetable dosa first, only to be told that its not available 5 mins later. Then, we asked if Ghee roast dry fruit dosa is available.. The waiter said yes, and then came back after 10 mins to tell us that that too is not available. We were a little pissed at this point, and after some confirmation ordered for a uthappam. But, as horrible their service is, they brought us a Rava dosa in place of Uthappam. Talk about inefficiency! The uthappam finally arrived though. Now talking about the 2 unlimited South Indian meals we bought, no one bothered to serve any of the dishes a second time. Even worse, when my dad asked them to serve one of the dishes a second time, the waiter nodded but never came back. Finally, the bananas which were served with the meals were also rotten. When we complained about the horrible service, the manager seemed to be least bothered. He didn't even look like a manager to be honest. <br />
<br />
All in all, Saravana Bhavan is a horrible place to go to. Not just this branch, its true of every branch of theirs. Their food may be hygienic and good (not excellent), but that hardly makes up for the poor service they offer. Avoid this place any day. And don't think that this experience of mine is a one-off. This is how Saravana Bhavan functions- arrogant and absolute disregard for customers. Boycott HSB.
                                        <div class="clear"></div>
                </div>
                <div class="rev-text-sm mbot0">
                    <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text-expand " tabindex="0">
                        <div data-iconr="ò" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-1" title="Poor" aria-label="Rated 1.0">Rated</div>

Then, we asked if Ghee roast dry fruit dosa is available.. The waiter said yes, and then came back after 10 mins to tell us that that too is not available. We were a little pissed at this point, and after some confirmation ordered for a uthappam. But, as horrible their service is, they brought us a Rava dosa in place of Uthappam. Talk about inefficiency! The uthappam finally arrived though. Now talking about the 2 unlimited South Indian meals we bought, no one...

                                <div class="fs12px pbot0 clearfix">
                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/DyqDL" class="grey-text">
                        <time datetime="2014-07-12 22:56:56" itemprop="datePublished">Jul 12, 2014</time>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ô" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-3" title="Poor" aria-label="Rated 2.0">Rated</div> 
                                            An average restaurant. The coffee is tasty treat. Something am fond of this restaurant is the chilly parota but I don't know why, it has lost its flavour. They sometimes serve you stale food which you have to get it replaced. The waiters here sometimes react as if they own the whole restaurant when asked for replacement. During the peak hours you get treated as if you're here for free food. And the way the head server or supervisor makes you wait is irritating. Take away is even worse. You get treated as if you've mean no importance to the restaurant. customer satisfaction is minimal but the only upside is the taste of the food. If you're lucky to be served fresh food that is. Wouldn't recommend if you want to hang out after a tiresome day.
                                                            <div class="clear"></div>
                </div>

<div itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope="" itemprop="review" style="display: block;">

    <span itemtype="http://schema.org/Restaurant" itemscope="" itemprop="itemReviewed" style="display:none">
        <span itemprop="name">Hotel Saravana Bhavan, Anna Nagar West, Chennai</span>
    </span>

    <div data-res_id="65499" data-snippet="restaurant-review" data-review_id="991854" class="  ui segments res-review-body res-review clearfix js-activity-root   item-to-hide-parent stupendousact">
        <div class="ui segment clearfix  brtop ">
            
            <div class="ui warning message error-message-highlight review-message hidden mbot"></div>

            <div class="ui item clearfix ">
                                <div class="item">
                    <div class="clearfix  mb10 ">
                        <div itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope="" itemprop="author" class="res-large-snippet ui horizontal list col-s-16  ">

  <div class="item col-s-16">
    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/users/shankar-raman-764722">
            <img data-original="https://b.zmtcdn.com/data/user_profile_pictures/cae/db52bb4e2aeec75f8cc9332f6b0e2cae.jpg?fit=around%7C100%3A100&amp;crop=100%3A100%3B%2A%2C%2A" src="https://b.zmtcdn.com/images/placeholder_200.png" alt="Shankar Raman" class="ui avatar image left tiny" />
          </a>


<!--      -->

    <div class="content col-l-11 large-snippet ml5 mt5">

      <div itemprop="name" class="header nowrap ui left">
                  <a data-entity_id="764722" href="https://www.zomato.com/users/shankar-raman-764722">
            Shankar Raman
          </a>
                
      </div>
                <div class="clear"></div>

      <span class="grey-text fontsize5 nowrap">

                        
                                            1 Review
                                ,
                          26 Followers
                                          
              </span>
        <div class="clear"></div>

                              <div data-is-followed="" data-user-id="764722" data-entity-type="USER" class="zs-follow-btn-container usr-page-follow-btn clear mt2">
                <a class="social-button follow-social cgrey ui basic large label ui-label-bb zs-follow-user-button" aria-label="Follow" role="button">Follow</a>
            </div>
          
                      </div>

  </div>
</div>

                    </div>
                </div>
                                <div class="fs12px pbot0 clearfix">
                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/LyZNK" class="grey-text">
                        <time datetime="2014-07-08 21:39:37" itemprop="datePublished">Jul 08, 2014</time>
                    </a>

                                        	                    
                </div>
            </div>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 hidden " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ò" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-1" title="Poor" aria-label="Rated 1.0">Rated</div> 
                    AVOID SARAVANA BHAVAN! HORRIBLE SERVICE!<br />
<br />
The moment you sit down to order food at Saravana bhavan, their staff makes you feel like you're here for free food. Let greetings alone, the waiters are just RUDE. I only occasionally go to any of their branches, and this time I understood why I don't visit this place often. So we went in to the A/C hall and ordered for 2 meals, 2 dosas and vada (their Non-A/C hall is worse). We ordered for vegetable dosa first, only to be told that its not available 5 mins later. Then, we asked if Ghee roast dry fruit dosa is available.. The waiter said yes, and then came back after 10 mins to tell us that that too is not available. We were a little pissed at this point, and after some confirmation ordered for a uthappam. But, as horrible their service is, they brought us a Rava dosa in place of Uthappam. Talk about inefficiency! The uthappam finally arrived though. Now talking about the 2 unlimited South Indian meals we bought, no one bothered to serve any of the dishes a second time. Even worse, when my dad asked them to serve one of the dishes a second time, the waiter nodded but never came back. Finally, the bananas which were served with the meals were also rotten. When we complained about the horrible service, the manager seemed to be least bothered. He didn't even look like a manager to be honest. <br />
<br />
All in all, Saravana Bhavan is a horrible place to go to. Not just this branch, its true of every branch of theirs. Their food may be hygienic and good (not excellent), but that hardly makes up for the poor service they offer. Avoid this place any day. And don't think that this experience of mine is a one-off. This is how Saravana Bhavan functions- arrogant and absolute disregard for customers. Boycott HSB.
                                        <div class="clear"></div>
                </div>
                <div class="rev-text-sm mbot0">
                    <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text-expand " tabindex="0">
                        <div data-iconr="ò" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-1" title="Poor" aria-label="Rated 1.0">Rated</div>

We were a little pissed at this point, and after some confirmation ordered for a uthappam. But, as horrible their service is, they brought us a Rava dosa in place of Uthappam. Talk about inefficiency! The uthappam finally arrived though. Now talking about the 2 unlimited South Indian meals we bought, no one...

                                <div class="fs12px pbot0 clearfix">
                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/DyqDL" class="grey-text">

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ô" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-3" title="Poor" aria-label="Rated 2.0">Rated</div> 
                                            An average restaurant. The coffee is tasty treat. Something am fond of this restaurant is the chilly parota but I don't know why, it has lost its flavour. They sometimes serve you stale food which you have to get it replaced. The waiters here sometimes react as if they own the whole restaurant when asked for replacement. During the peak hours you get treated as if you're here for free food. And the way the head server or supervisor makes you wait is irritating. Take away is even worse. You get treated as if you've mean no importance to the restaurant. customer satisfaction is minimal but the only upside is the taste of the food. If you're lucky to be served fresh food that is. Wouldn't recommend if you want to hang out after a tiresome day.
                                                            <div class="clear"></div>
                </div>

    <span itemtype="http://schema.org/Restaurant" itemscope="" itemprop="itemReviewed" style="display:none">
        <span itemprop="name">Hotel Saravana Bhavan, Anna Nagar West, Chennai</span>

    <div data-res_id="65499" data-snippet="restaurant-review" data-review_id="991854" class="  ui segments res-review-body res-review clearfix js-activity-root   item-to-hide-parent stupendousact">
        <div class="ui segment clearfix  brtop ">

                                <div class="item">
                    <div class="clearfix  mb10 ">
                        <div itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope="" itemprop="author" class="res-large-snippet ui horizontal list col-s-16  ">

  <div class="item col-s-16">
    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/users/shankar-raman-764722">
            <img data-original="https://b.zmtcdn.com/data/user_profile_pictures/cae/db52bb4e2aeec75f8cc9332f6b0e2cae.jpg?fit=around%7C100%3A100&amp;crop=100%3A100%3B%2A%2C%2A" src="https://b.zmtcdn.com/images/placeholder_200.png" alt="Shankar Raman" class="ui avatar image left tiny" />
          </a>

    <div class="content col-l-11 large-snippet ml5 mt5">

      <div itemprop="name" class="header nowrap ui left">
                  <a data-entity_id="764722" href="https://www.zomato.com/users/shankar-raman-764722">

                                <div class="fs12px pbot0 clearfix">
                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/LyZNK" class="grey-text">
                        <time datetime="2014-07-08 21:39:37" itemprop="datePublished">Jul 08, 2014</time>
                    </a>

                                        	                    
                </div>
            </div>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 hidden " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ò" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-1" title="Poor" aria-label="Rated 1.0">Rated</div> 
                    AVOID SARAVANA BHAVAN! HORRIBLE SERVICE!<br />
<br />
The moment you sit down to order food at Saravana bhavan, their staff makes you feel like you're here for free food. Let greetings alone, the waiters are just RUDE. I only occasionally go to any of their branches, and this time I understood why I don't visit this place often. So we went in to the A/C hall and ordered for 2 meals, 2 dosas and vada (their Non-A/C hall is worse). We ordered for vegetable dosa first, only to be told that its not available 5 mins later. Then, we asked if Ghee roast dry fruit dosa is available.. The waiter said yes, and then came back after 10 mins to tell us that that too is not available. We were a little pissed at this point, and after some confirmation ordered for a uthappam. But, as horrible their service is, they brought us a Rava dosa in place of Uthappam. Talk about inefficiency! The uthappam finally arrived though. Now talking about the 2 unlimited South Indian meals we bought, no one bothered to serve any of the dishes a second time. Even worse, when my dad asked them to serve one of the dishes a second time, the waiter nodded but never came back. Finally, the bananas which were served with the meals were also rotten. When we complained about the horrible service, the manager seemed to be least bothered. He didn't even look like a manager to be honest. <br />
<br />
All in all, Saravana Bhavan is a horrible place to go to. Not just this branch, its true of every branch of theirs. Their food may be hygienic and good (not excellent), but that hardly makes up for the poor service they offer. Avoid this place any day. And don't think that this experience of mine is a one-off. This is how Saravana Bhavan functions- arrogant and absolute disregard for customers. Boycott HSB.
                                        <div class="clear"></div>
                </div>
                <div class="rev-text-sm mbot0">
                    <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text-expand " tabindex="0">

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ó" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-2" title="Poor" aria-label="Rated 1.5">Rated</div> 
                                            Hotel Saravana Bhavan no longer lives up to its name. Firstly, the cleanliness is the worst. I don't think the dishes are even washed but just soaked in water.  Service isn't bad. But since I demand cleanliness, I don't prefer this restaurant. Also, it was way better before when there was a restaurant on the rooftop. The theme was really good. But after the recent renovations, I am disappointed.

                                            Hotel Saravana bhavan is known to lovable quality with clean and hygenic environment. <br />
<br />
I had visited this branch 7.00 AM in the morning because i have came to anna nagar to write exam in anna adharsh college.<br />

<br />
If you want to taste Coffee that too 'Filter Coffee", no choices ..Only one option ..HSB

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ó" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-2" title="Poor" aria-label="Rated 1.5">Rated</div> 
                                            Hotel Saravana Bhavan no longer lives up to its name. Firstly, the cleanliness is the worst. I don't think the dishes are even washed but just soaked in water.  Service isn't bad. But since I demand cleanliness, I don't prefer this restaurant. Also, it was way better before when there was a restaurant on the rooftop. The theme was really good. But after the recent renovations, I am disappointed.

                                            Hotel Saravana bhavan is known to lovable quality with clean and hygenic environment. <br />
<br />
I had visited this branch 7.00 AM in the morning because i have came to anna nagar to write exam in anna adharsh college.<br />
So, I ordered idly and vadai in that time. As usal, Food was awesome with tasty. Then i tasted the cofee which remembers the filter cofee which i have taken in my friends house (bramin style).<br />
<br />
If you want to taste Coffee that too 'Filter Coffee", no choices ..Only one option ..HSB

                                <div class="fs12px pbot0 clearfix">
                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/EmAbk" class="grey-text">
                        <time datetime="2014-07-03 17:44:37" itemprop="datePublished">Jul 03, 2014</time>
                    </a>

                                        	                    
                </div>
            </div>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ó" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-2" title="Poor" aria-label="Rated 1.5">Rated</div> 
                                            Hotel Saravana Bhavan no longer lives up to its name. Firstly, the cleanliness is the worst. I don't think the dishes are even washed but just soaked in water.  Service isn't bad. But since I demand cleanliness, I don't prefer this restaurant. Also, it was way better before when there was a restaurant on the rooftop. The theme was really good. But after the recent renovations, I am disappointed.
                                                            <div class="clear"></div>
                </div>

                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/xpvxa" class="grey-text">

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ö" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-5" title="Average" aria-label="Rated 3.0">Rated</div> 
                                            Hotel Saravana bhavan is known to lovable quality with clean and hygenic environment. <br />
<br />
I had visited this branch 7.00 AM in the morning because i have came to anna nagar to write exam in anna adharsh college.<br />
So, I ordered idly and vadai in that time. As usal, Food was awesome with tasty. Then i tasted the cofee which remembers the filter cofee which i have taken in my friends house (bramin style).<br />
<br />
If you want to taste Coffee that too 'Filter Coffee", no choices ..Only one option ..HSB
                                                            <div class="clear"></div>
                </div>

                    <div data-iconr="ó" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-2" title="Poor" aria-label="Rated 1.5">Rated</div> 
                                            Hotel Saravana Bhavan no longer lives up to its name. Firstly, the cleanliness is the worst. I don't think the dishes are even washed but just soaked in water.  Service isn't bad. But since I demand cleanliness, I don't prefer this restaurant. Also, it was way better before when there was a restaurant on the rooftop. The theme was really good. But after the recent renovations, I am disappointed.

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ö" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-5" title="Average" aria-label="Rated 3.0">Rated</div> 
                                            Hotel Saravana bhavan is known to lovable quality with clean and hygenic environment. <br />
<br />
I had visited this branch 7.00 AM in the morning because i have came to anna nagar to write exam in anna adharsh college.<br />
So, I ordered idly and vadai in that time. As usal, Food was awesome with tasty. Then i tasted the cofee which remembers the filter cofee which i have taken in my friends house (bramin style).<br />
<br />
If you want to taste Coffee that too 'Filter Coffee", no choices ..Only one option ..HSB
                                                            <div class="clear"></div>
                </div>

                                <div class="fs12px pbot0 clearfix">
                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/xozDK" class="grey-text">
                        <time datetime="2014-05-30 15:54:26" itemprop="datePublished">May 30, 2014</time>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ù" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-7" title="Very Good" aria-label="Rated 4.0">Rated</div> 
                                            Hotel Saravana bhavan is known for a lot of things and their famed and lovable quality to maintain a clean and hygenic environment.  <br />
<br />
I happened to visit this outlet at 7.30 AM in the morning to have a coffee , something I admire very much after a visit to a temple nearby. The coffee always turns up perfectly at a Saravana Bhavan , wonder what the secret is.<br />
<br />
Also I was surprised to see shrink wrapped bowls of cut fruit for health conscious patrons. I asked them to parcel some sambar and vada curry which I could have with piping hot idlis and at home. You can never have enough at a Saravana bhavan.<br />
<br />
If anyone knows the secret to a great filter coffee do share with me...............................
                                                            <div class="clear"></div>
                </div>

                                <div class="fs12px pbot0 clearfix">
                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/xozDK" class="grey-text">
                        <time datetime="2014-05-30 15:54:26" itemprop="datePublished">May 30, 2014</time>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ù" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-7" title="Very Good" aria-label="Rated 4.0">Rated</div> 
                                            Hotel Saravana bhavan is known for a lot of things and their famed and lovable quality to maintain a clean and hygenic environment.  <br />
<br />
I happened to visit this outlet at 7.30 AM in the morning to have a coffee , something I admire very much after a visit to a temple nearby. The coffee always turns up perfectly at a Saravana Bhavan , wonder what the secret is.<br />
<br />
Also I was surprised to see shrink wrapped bowls of cut fruit for health conscious patrons. I asked them to parcel some sambar and vada curry which I could have with piping hot idlis and at home. You can never have enough at a Saravana bhavan.<br />
<br />
If anyone knows the secret to a great filter coffee do share with me...............................
                                                            <div class="clear"></div>
                </div>

                    <div class="js_review_comment_right review-comment-right dimmer-comment-box pl0i">

                                <div class="fs12px pbot0 clearfix">
                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/GOKPy" class="grey-text">
                        <time datetime="2014-05-25 22:54:40" itemprop="datePublished">May 25, 2014</time>
                    </a>

                                        	                    
                </div>
            </div>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ó" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-2" title="Poor" aria-label="Rated 1.5">Rated</div> 
                                            It is fourth time in a row this place has disappointed me. The meal section was horrible. The waiters were fighting amongst themselves. The server was standing in a corner and showed face if I need to call him. OMG the most important of all, the food was tasting pathetic. The poriyal has always been never cooked. The rice has soda in it. The sweets are way below the par. Everytime, I go there with expectation and never failed to get disappointed. If you go there, just have limited tiffin and come back. However, the cost is sky-rocketing and the quantity has gone down. I sincerely hope that they bring the magic they had 10 years back.
                                                            <div class="clear"></div>
                </div>

                    <div data-iconr="ù" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-7" title="Very Good" aria-label="Rated 4.0">Rated</div> 
                                            Got sick of eating breakfast or lunch at home?<br />
<br />
Then u gotta try this hotel!<br />
I would always order like 2 plates of idly and a ghee roast and vadai of course!<br />

Really slow service! :/<br />

Quality :- 4.5/ 5<br />
Cost :-  4/ 5<br />
Taste : 4.5/ 5<br />
Service : 1.5/ 5<br />
Ambiance : 3 / 5<br />
Overall : 4/ 5

        <span itemprop="name">Hotel Saravana Bhavan, Anna Nagar West, Chennai</span>

    <div data-res_id="65499" data-snippet="restaurant-review" data-review_id="749210" class="  ui segments res-review-body res-review clearfix js-activity-root   item-to-hide-parent stupendousact">
        <div class="ui segment clearfix  brtop ">
            
            <div class="ui warning message error-message-highlight review-message hidden mbot"></div>

            <div class="ui item clearfix ">
                                <div class="item">
                    <div class="clearfix  mb10 ">
                        <div itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope="" itemprop="author" class="res-large-snippet ui horizontal list col-s-16  ">

  <div class="item col-s-16">
    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/users/kandasamy-kishore-1862724">
            <img data-original="https://b.zmtcdn.com/data/user_profile_pictures/3e1/bdb402085e5261d427354901dd87f3e1.jpg?fit=around%7C100%3A100&amp;crop=100%3A100%3B%2A%2C%2A" src="https://b.zmtcdn.com/data/user_profile_pictures/3e1/bdb402085e5261d427354901dd87f3e1.jpg?fit=around%7C100%3A100&amp;crop=100%3A100%3B%2A%2C%2A" alt="Kandasamy Kishore" class="ui avatar image left tiny" style="display: block;" />
          </a>


<!--      -->

    <div class="content col-l-11 large-snippet ml5 mt5">

      <div itemprop="name" class="header nowrap ui left">
                  <a data-entity_id="1862724" href="https://www.zomato.com/users/kandasamy-kishore-1862724">
            Kandasamy Kishore
          </a>
                
      </div>
                <div class="clear"></div>

      <span class="grey-text fontsize5 nowrap">

                        
                                            22 Reviews
                                ,
                          149 Followers
                                          
              </span>
        <div class="clear"></div>

                              <div data-is-followed="" data-user-id="1862724" data-entity-type="USER" class="zs-follow-btn-container usr-page-follow-btn clear mt2">
                <a class="social-button follow-social cgrey ui basic large label ui-label-bb zs-follow-user-button" aria-label="Follow" role="button">Follow</a>
            </div>
          
                      </div>

  </div>
</div>

                    </div>
                </div>
                                <div class="fs12px pbot0 clearfix">
                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/BgkAY" class="grey-text">
                        <time datetime="2014-05-14 00:12:40" itemprop="datePublished">May 14, 2014</time>
                    </a>

                                        	                    
                </div>
            </div>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 hidden " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ù" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-7" title="Very Good" aria-label="Rated 4.0">Rated</div> 
                    Read carefully - This review is on the HSB 300 rupees buffet and not a general review.. Saravana bhavan is losing its name and glory because of its poor service at few of its outlets.. The poor quantity for the price you pay is also another reason.. But on the other hand the taste is not compromised.. I missed my grand parent's 60th anniversary treat because i was out of town..so a week later they planned to take me here when i returned back.. Since they informed me a day back..i had a light breakfast that day morning.. I was very hungry that My stomach started rumbling when i reached the hotel.. We were escorted to our table at the 4th floor.. Let me first list the items on the menu..(menu keeps changing everyday).. 1) welcome drink (grape , apple ) , 2 varieties of soup ( mushroom shorba and sweet corn) 2) bread and bun with jam and butter 3) starters - gobi tikka , sesame fried balls , curd vadai.. 4) pani poori , bhel poori , dhai poori 5) plain and butter naan...and roti.. 6) idly , dosai , oothappam (on order) 7) dal makhni , mixed vegetable curry. 8) veg fried rice , some noodle , biriyani , pizza (on order) 9)white rice , sambar , rasam , 2 porriyal(potato fry and beans) 10) curd rice , 3 varieties of pickle , papads , vadagam and vathal 11) raw vegetable salad , semi cooked veg salad. 12) vanilla mousse , fruit cake , cup cake , donuts.. 13) jangri , laddu , badhusha and mysore pak. 14) either vanilla , pista or chocolate ice cream.. Woooo..my hands are paining typing everything :D The sesame balls were awesome...and the curd vadai too... The fried rice was good...the only thing i couldnt eat was the noodles ( unplesant conoconut oil smell)..the rest were good.. This buffet is a total worth for money..i would recommend this to everyone... A very good move by the management by introducing this buffet equalizing for the loss of its name... Try this out for once and you will not regret your decision.. Cheers :)
                                        <div class="clear"></div>
                </div>
                <div class="rev-text-sm mbot0">
                    <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text-expand " tabindex="0">
                        <div data-iconr="ù" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-7" title="Very Good" aria-label="Rated 4.0">Rated</div>

                    <div data-iconr="ò" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-1" title="Poor" aria-label="Rated 1.0">Rated</div> 
                                            For home delivery.   1. Had to call atleast 3 different numbers to get the order done 2. Order taker don't speak or understand anything other than Tamil.. Had hard time to place order. 3. To much noise around order taker on phone 4. Order was taken at 6:30 PM in evening and was delivered at 9:30 pm after repeated calls 5. Food was cold and soft, had hard time chewing it. Would never use home delivery service of Sarvana Bhavan.. It's a patethic experience.

                                <div class="fs12px pbot0 clearfix">
                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/BKelX" class="grey-text">
                        <time datetime="2014-04-30 00:26:04" itemprop="datePublished">Apr 30, 2014</time>
                    </a>

                                        	                    
                </div>
            </div>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="è" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-8" title="Excellent" aria-label="Rated 4.5">Rated</div> 
                                            Who wouldn't like saravana Bhavan!<br />
I will surely be the favourite restaurant of most South Indian vegetarian food lovers!<br />
Their saambaar and green chutney is heaven! <br />
I will always have the mood for their onion rava , ghee roast , rava kesari , mix veg paratha and their special pure filter coffee!<br />
A small complaint in recent days is that their service has become a little slow! <br />
Otherwise.. Anytime I will visit this place!<br />
Rates have been reduced - I don't kno the reason! But I don't mind paying for their quality!
                                                            <div class="clear"></div>
                </div>

    <div data-res_id="65499" data-snippet="restaurant-review" data-review_id="516329" class="  ui segments res-review-body res-review clearfix js-activity-root   item-to-hide-parent stupendousact">
        <div class="ui segment clearfix  brtop ">
            
            <div class="ui warning message error-message-highlight review-message hidden mbot"></div>

            <div class="ui item clearfix ">
                                <div class="item">
                    <div class="clearfix  mb10 ">
                        <div itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope="" itemprop="author" class="res-large-snippet ui horizontal list col-s-16  ">

  <div class="item col-s-16">
    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/lavanash">
            <img data-original="https://b.zmtcdn.com/data/user_profile_pictures/7fc/7ea9466af340cb60a69b59fef26357fc.jpg?fit=around%7C100%3A100&amp;crop=100%3A100%3B%2A%2C%2A" src="https://b.zmtcdn.com/data/user_profile_pictures/7fc/7ea9466af340cb60a69b59fef26357fc.jpg?fit=around%7C100%3A100&amp;crop=100%3A100%3B%2A%2C%2A" alt="Lav A" class="ui avatar image left tiny" style="display: block;" />
          </a>


<!--      -->

    <div class="content col-l-11 large-snippet ml5 mt5">

      <div itemprop="name" class="header nowrap ui left">
                  <a data-entity_id="1754413" href="https://www.zomato.com/lavanash">
            Lav A
          </a>
                
      </div>
                <div class="clear"></div>

      <span class="grey-text fontsize5 nowrap">

                        
                                            69 Reviews
                                ,
                          74 Followers
                                          
              </span>
        <div class="clear"></div>

                              <div data-is-followed="" data-user-id="1754413" data-entity-type="USER" class="zs-follow-btn-container usr-page-follow-btn clear mt2">
                <a class="social-button follow-social cgrey ui basic large label ui-label-bb zs-follow-user-button" aria-label="Follow" role="button">Follow</a>

  </div>

                    </div>
                </div>
                                <div class="fs12px pbot0 clearfix">
                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/vQBZR" class="grey-text">
                        <time datetime="2014-03-16 16:50:29" itemprop="datePublished">Mar 16, 2014</time>
                    </a>

                                        	                    
                </div>
            </div>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 hidden " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ó" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-2" title="Poor" aria-label="Rated 1.5">Rated</div> 
                    The food is always amazing and maintained at a distinct standard in all branches here and abroad.....BUT....Don't visit this particular branch the service is appalling. I couldn't find an official saravana bavan site to lodge a complaint... <br />
<br />
We went yesterday night and the service was disgusting. The waiter was impatient, weird and kind of rude. The server even worse kept mixing up our orders and just dumping food on us irrespective of whether we have finished the first course or not, irrespective of whether the table was cleared or not, as if its his duty to plonk everything on the table and be done with it. <br />
<br />
The second course was dumped on us when we were not even halfway through the first course. We had specifically told them to bring it bit late. We went as family with two young kids. At the end we had ordered ice creams for them. The sever didn't even bother to wait or check or ask us and just went ahead and brought the ice cream when the kids were about halfway through their appams ! Well which kid can resist ice cream! Both kids abandoned the appams for ice cream. Next halfway through ice cream the bill and after meals sweets, saunf are thrust onto us..again kids dump the ice cream for the saunf! Come on server have a brain... Oh by the way i forgot to mention he dumped finger bowls on us when we were eating phulkas. The kids hadnt finished the appams, the ice creams were there plus uncleared plates plus finger bowls! Complete chaos and he was the LEAST bothered. I was so enraged i didnt want to even leave a tip. What pathetic service? <br />
<br />
The food was not upto the mark either.. The phulkas dried put and appams burnt!  Utterly disgusted and vow never to visit this particular branch again!
                                        <div class="clear"></div>
                </div>
                <div class="rev-text-sm mbot0">
                    <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text-expand " tabindex="0">
                        <div data-iconr="ó" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-2" title="Poor" aria-label="Rated 1.5">Rated</div>

<br />

<br />

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ó" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-2" title="Poor" aria-label="Rated 1.5">Rated</div> 
                                            HSB has been iconic in chennai for its taster and quality however in the last few years it has deteriorated a lot in service levels and the quality of food<br />

<br />

----- 05 Mar, 2014 -----<br />

Used to love it now it has deteriorated a lot. The service levels have dropped and the hotel which used to set standards is following others .

                                <div class="fs12px pbot0 clearfix">
                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/eDkgG" class="grey-text">
                        <time datetime="2014-02-05 10:42:24" itemprop="datePublished">Feb 05, 2014</time>
                    </a>

                                        	                    
                </div>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ø" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-6" title="Good" aria-label="Rated 3.5">Rated</div> 
                                            It was a weekend Buffet at HSB located in Anna nagar west. was't crowded much so there was no waiting time . we were informed the welcome drink , Roti/naan and the soup will be served and the rest is self. the spread was quite good even though one might say the varieties are less. To start with , the welcome drink never tasted anything like it anywhere else. can't take more than a sip , am sorry it was dreadful. only then we noticed the drink was untouched on the other tables also. then came the soup, which was good and creamy too.  i need not mention the what all food type present in the spread but the ones doing good are,<br />
fried veggies,<br />
appalam,<br />
dal,<br />
peas pullov,<br />
veg butter masala,<br />
vatha kuzhambu.<br />
<br />
the deserts certainly need an improvement and also the time taken for the refill. apart from the non-drinkable welcome drink , the food is good. the bill for two comes around Rs.600
                                                            <div class="clear"></div>
                </div>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ø" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-6" title="Good" aria-label="Rated 3.5">Rated</div> 
                                            been to chennai, and not to this place, not fair...<br />
a place well known for the best south indian food...<br />
<br />
they have pretty good menu and specially the variety of DOSA..<br />
i am from north india, Delhi to be very precise, and i found this place to be the iconic place in Chennai<br />
staff is nice, very friendly <br />
food quality is also good.<br />
being located in such a good location, it is hard to miss the SARVANA BHAWAN...<br />
<br />
if i am going back to chennai, then definitely i will have food at least once here..
                                                                <br /><br /><a target="_blank" href="https://www.zomato.com/spoonback?u=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.bragstreet.in&amp;r=431940&amp;to=288258&amp;k=0cdf9a9cc577eae1dc6e98234e3f1bed"><span class="left red-text">bragstreet.in</span><span data-icon="ŧ" class="grey-text left ml5"></span></a>

<div itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope="" itemprop="review" style="display: block;">

    <span itemtype="http://schema.org/Restaurant" itemscope="" itemprop="itemReviewed" style="display:none">
        <span itemprop="name">Hotel Saravana Bhavan, Anna Nagar West, Chennai</span>
    </span>

    <div data-res_id="65499" data-snippet="restaurant-review" data-review_id="358367" class="  ui segments res-review-body res-review clearfix js-activity-root   item-to-hide-parent stupendousact">
        <div class="ui segment clearfix  brtop ">
            
            <div class="ui warning message error-message-highlight review-message hidden mbot"></div>

            <div class="ui item clearfix ">
                                <div class="item">
                    <div class="clearfix  mb10 ">
                        <div itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope="" itemprop="author" class="res-large-snippet ui horizontal list col-s-16  ">

  <div class="item col-s-16">
    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/varsha_dogra">
            <img data-original="https://b.zmtcdn.com/data/user_profile_pictures/a63/1cc456fddcab5b960ce6a47737cd2a63.jpg?fit=around%7C100%3A100&amp;crop=100%3A100%3B%2A%2C%2A" src="https://b.zmtcdn.com/data/user_profile_pictures/a63/1cc456fddcab5b960ce6a47737cd2a63.jpg?fit=around%7C100%3A100&amp;crop=100%3A100%3B%2A%2C%2A" alt="Varsha Dogra" class="ui avatar image left tiny" style="display: block;" />
          </a>


<!--      -->

    <div class="content col-l-11 large-snippet ml5 mt5">

      <div itemprop="name" class="header nowrap ui left">
                  <a data-entity_id="737224" href="https://www.zomato.com/varsha_dogra">
            Varsha Dogra
          </a>
                
      </div>
                <div class="clear"></div>

      <span class="grey-text fontsize5 nowrap">

                        
                                            24 Reviews
                                ,
                          136 Followers
                                          
              </span>
        <div class="clear"></div>

                              <div data-is-followed="" data-user-id="737224" data-entity-type="USER" class="zs-follow-btn-container usr-page-follow-btn clear mt2">
                <a class="social-button follow-social cgrey ui basic large label ui-label-bb zs-follow-user-button" aria-label="Follow" role="button">Follow</a>
            </div>
          
                      </div>

  </div>
</div>

                    </div>
                </div>
                                <div class="fs12px pbot0 clearfix">
                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/dlEAr" class="grey-text">
                        <time datetime="2013-11-01 11:32:11" itemprop="datePublished">Nov 01, 2013</time>
                    </a>

                                        	                    
                </div>
            </div>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 hidden " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="õ" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-4" title="Average" aria-label="Rated 2.5">Rated</div> 
                    When I first moved to Chennai, the one restaurant that everyone suggested was HSB. It was ‘the’ place to try the authentic taste of traditional south Indian Tiffin items and meals. I don’t remember my first visit but I definitely remember the first item I tried here – the mini idli’s (known as 14 idli’s). Since then, this breakfast item has always been a regular member in my top 5 classic HSB food chart. <br />
<br />
The A-Ng branch holds a special place for me as it used to be one of the common hangouts for a huge group of us. Be it bunking college, birthday treats, exam treats or anything, HSB was never a boring place and the food was absolutely ‘yum’ especially the Sambar. As you enter the restaurant, you may not find the appearance pleasing. The ground floor is mainly for people interested in buying snacks or for those who want to enjoy a refreshing beverage. You can also buy many of the sweets and savories that have been quite popular. The floors above are meant for dining customized to cater services for people of mixed groups. The food however is the same but varies in their presentation.<br />
<br />
During my last visit, I was completely agitated seeing the huge transformation in the quality of food. My friends and I had gone there for a lunch treat. We had ordered few starters, butter naan, paneer butter masala, one south Indian thaali, and Veg Biryani.  While my friend finished first few spoons of the biryani, the dish was passed to the others to taste when I suddenly noticed something dark in the raitha. There was a sudden pause and all of us stopped munching, looking at each other in disbelief. After a serious talk if the legged insect was a fly or cockroach or hybrid mustard that we were unaware of, we zeroed in on the common house fly. When we showed the raitha to the person who served us the dish, he just smiled and said sorry. His manager then asked him what happened and he quickly whispered to him before heading to the kitchen only to bring back another bowl of raitha. This time we did not eat anything. The image of the fly was more than enough to fill our stomach. Much to our surprise, we were also given the bill for which we even paid to avoid making a scene. <br />
<br />
Irrespective of this experience, being a regular customer of HSB for over nine years I would certainly recommend you the following items: <br />
•	14 Idli’s – Def Must!<br />
•	Masala Dosa<br />
•	Mini Tiffin (This usually is a combination of 5 mini idli’s, pongal, mini masala dosa and kesari)<br />
•	Sambar Vada<br />
•	Rava Kitchidi <br />
•	Pongal<br />
•	South Indian Thaali (lunch item)<br />
•	Coffee<br />
<br />
These items are the typical south Indian breakfast items and have also been on HSB menu for a long time. I have also tried other food items like paratha with kurma, aloo matter, poori channa, poori with the potato bhaaji, some other north Indian side dishes, and Noodles. Somehow, I am not a big fan of anything other than the breakfast items. The paratha’s have been either too oily, or uncooked, the Biryani’s would be too oily and if you have asked for home delivery, don’t be surprised to notice a thick coat of oil in the curry or hair. <br />
<br />
My verdict on HSB:<br />
•	Ambience: 3.5/5<br />
•	Food Quality: 2/5<br />
•	Service: 3/5<br />
•	Price: Too pricey for the quality of food served<br />
<br />
A note to the management: Please prioritize cleanliness and improve the quality of food. The food delivered at home also needs to be worked on.
                                        <div class="clear"></div>
                </div>
                <div class="rev-text-sm mbot0">
                    <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text-expand " tabindex="0">

    <div data-res_id="65499" data-snippet="restaurant-review" data-review_id="325557" class="  ui segments res-review-body res-review clearfix js-activity-root   item-to-hide-parent stupendousact">
        <div class="ui segment clearfix  brtop ">

            <div class="ui item clearfix ">
                                <div class="item">
                    <div class="clearfix  mb10 ">
                        <div itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope="" itemprop="author" class="res-large-snippet ui horizontal list col-s-16  ">

                                <div class="fs12px pbot0 clearfix">
                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/MwygB" class="grey-text">
                        <time datetime="2013-07-29 21:08:28" itemprop="datePublished">Jul 29, 2013</time>
                    </a>

                                        	                    
                </div>
            </div>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="ø" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-6" title="Good" aria-label="Rated 3.5">Rated</div> 
                                            A visit to Chennai for me is incomplete with out visiting to Sarvana Bhavan. Pure food, Pure South. Curd rice is alway served in a mashed way and very pasty. Roti and Phulka are always soft and tasty. Juices are good. Aloo Gobhi curry was superb. It was rich in taste and thick curry. Service is always good. Ambience is excellent in AC hall. They got a sweet section in ground floor. It also serves tasty sweets.
                                                            <div class="clear"></div>
                </div>

                        <div itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope="" itemprop="author" class="res-large-snippet ui horizontal list col-s-16  ">

  <div class="item col-s-16">
    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/ruban">
            <img data-original="https://b.zmtcdn.com/data/user_profile_pictures/f98/eaad434e02e076d873ad4746ea100f98.jpg?fit=around%7C100%3A100&amp;crop=100%3A100%3B%2A%2C%2A" src="https://b.zmtcdn.com/images/placeholder_200.png" alt="Ruban Chakravarthy" class="ui avatar image left tiny" />
          </a>


<!--      -->

    <div class="content col-l-11 large-snippet ml5 mt5">

      <div itemprop="name" class="header nowrap ui left">
                  <a data-entity_id="844568" href="https://www.zomato.com/ruban">
            Ruban Chakravarthy
          </a>
                
      </div>
                <div class="clear"></div>

      <span class="grey-text fontsize5 nowrap">

                        
                                            22 Reviews
                                ,
                          40 Followers
                                          
              </span>
        <div class="clear"></div>

                              <div data-is-followed="" data-user-id="844568" data-entity-type="USER" class="zs-follow-btn-container usr-page-follow-btn clear mt2">
                <a class="social-button follow-social cgrey ui basic large label ui-label-bb zs-follow-user-button" aria-label="Follow" role="button">Follow</a>
            </div>
          
                      </div>

  </div>
</div>

                    </div>
                </div>
                                <div class="fs12px pbot0 clearfix">
                    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/review/dLvKP" class="grey-text">
                        <time datetime="2013-07-27 12:24:20" itemprop="datePublished">Jul 27, 2013</time>
                    </a>

                                        	                    
                </div>
            </div>

                            <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text mbot0 hidden " itemprop="description" tabindex="0">
                    <div data-iconr="õ" class="ttupper fs12px left bold zdhl2 tooltip icon-font-level-4" title="Average" aria-label="Rated 2.5">Rated</div> 
                    The restaurant seem busy throughout the day like any other Saravana Bhavan known for the flavourful sambar and other South Indian varieties. This time around I wish to fancy other cuisines from the menu which doesn’t turned out smashing.<br />
<br />
It’s a four floored restaurant. I had to go to the second floor for the North Indian, Gujarati and Chinese menus. The seating was comfortable and clean. The waiter had a gloomy face and the smile was missing from his face. The menu card is long and confusing. Had to spend good 5 mins to gaze through the long menu.<br />
<br />
When compared to the South Indian dishes served by this restaurant, the other cuisines were certainly below par. The flavours were mediocre. <br />
<br />
The Chinese Fried Vegetables nowhere near Chinese style of preparation. It lacks seasoning and tasted just like some vegetable pakora. The Mushroom fried rice was soggy and found more capsicum bits than mushrooms. They may as well call it the capsicum fried rice than mushroom fried rice! The Kadai Paneer again lacked seasoning and the fancy candle at the bottom of the dish bowl is more of a menace than a fancy look. Creates black smoke at the bottom of the dish and mostly it’s a dangerous act when you are dining with kids on the table. This may lead to any unexpected fire accident!<br />
<br />
The Paneer Tikka was not bad on the flavour and the mint chutney which goes along with it balances the lack of seasoning on the tikkas. All the dishes we tried cries for seasoning and we had to use the salt dispenser constantly to make them better. The Carrot Halwas has a peculiar kofta like ingredient which is not necessary which does not taste good.<br />
<br />
Overall if you are planning to visit Saravana Bhavan in Anna nagar, it’s wise to stick with South Indian varieties. But if you are an experimental minded, you may well try other items but it won’t treat you well.
                                        <div class="clear"></div>
                </div>
                <div class="rev-text-sm mbot0">
                    <div style="line-height: 20px;" class="rev-text-expand " tabindex="0">

    <span itemtype="http://schema.org/Restaurant" itemscope="" itemprop="itemReviewed" style="display:none">

            <div class="ui warning message error-message-highlight review-message hidden mbot"></div>

            <div class="ui item clearfix ">
                                <div class="item">
                    <div class="clearfix  mb10 ">
                        <div itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope="" itemprop="author" class="res-large-snippet ui horizontal list col-s-16  ">

  <div class="item col-s-16">
    <a href="https://www.zomato.com/george">
            <img data-original="https://b.zmtcdn.com/data/user_profile_pictures/cbd/6d2624e83a6d043c2156de587f311cbd.jpg?fit=around%7C100%3A100&amp;crop=100%3A100%3B%2A%2C%2A" src="https://b.zmtcdn.com/data/user_profile_pictures/cbd/6d2624e83a6d043c2156de587f311cbd.jpg?fit=around%7C100%3A100&amp;crop=100%3A100%3B%2A%2C%2A" alt="George Abraham" class="ui avatar image left tiny" style="display: block;" />
          </a>

    <div class="content col-l-11 large-snippet ml5 mt5">
